2857
2858! For iceflag=3 option, ice particle generalized effective size is limited to 5.0 to 140.0 microns
2859
2860 elseif (iceflag .ge. 3) then
2861 if (radice .lt. 5.0_rb .or. radice .gt. 140.0_rb) then
2862 write(errmess,'(A,i5,i5,f8.2,f8.2)' ) &
2863 'ERROR: ICE GENERALIZED EFFECTIVE SIZE OUT OF BOUNDS' &
2864 ,ig, lay, ciwpmc(ig,lay), radice
2865 fatal_error(errmess)
2866 end if
2867 ncbands = 16
2868 factor = (radice - 2._rb)/3._rb
2869 index = int(factor)
2870 if (index .eq. 46) index = 45
2871 fint = factor - float(index)
2872 ib = ngb(ig)
2873 abscoice(ig) = &
2874 absice3(index,ib) + fint * &
2875 (absice3(index+1,ib) - (absice3(index,ib)))
2876 abscosno(ig) = 0.0_rb
2877
2878 endif
2879
2880!..Incorporate additional effects due to snow.
2881 if (cswpmc(ig,lay).gt.0.0_rb .and. iceflag .eq. 5) then
2882 radsno = resnmc(lay)
2883 if (radsno .lt. 5.0_rb .or. radsno .gt. 140.0_rb) then
2884 write(errmess,'(A,i5,i5,f8.2,f8.2)' ) &
2885 'ERROR: SNOW GENERALIZED EFFECTIVE SIZE OUT OF BOUNDS' &
2886 ,ig, lay, cswpmc(ig,lay), radsno
2887 fatal_error(errmess)
2888 end if
2889 ncbands = 16
2890 factor = (radsno - 2._rb)/3._rb
2891 index = int(factor)
2892 if (index .eq. 46) index = 45
2893 fint = factor - float(index)
2894 ib = ngb(ig)
2895 abscosno(ig) = &
2896 absice3(index,ib) + fint * &
2897 (absice3(index+1,ib) - (absice3(index,ib)))
2898 endif
2899
2900
2901! Calculation of absorption coefficients due to water clouds.
2902 if (clwpmc(ig,lay) .eq. 0.0_rb) then
2903 abscoliq(ig) = 0.0_rb
2904
2905 elseif (liqflag .eq. 0) then
2906 abscoliq(ig) = absliq0
2907
2908 elseif (liqflag .eq. 1) then
2909 radliq = relqmc(lay)
2910 if (radliq .lt. 2.5_rb .or. radliq .gt. 60._rb) stop &
2911 'LIQUID EFFECTIVE RADIUS OUT OF BOUNDS'
2912 index = int(radliq - 1.5_rb)
2913 if (index .eq. 0) index = 1
2914 if (index .eq. 58) index = 57
2915 fint = radliq - 1.5_rb - float(index)
2916 ib = ngb(ig)
2917 abscoliq(ig) = &
2918 absliq1(index,ib) + fint * &
2919 (absliq1(index+1,ib) - (absliq1(index,ib)))
2920 endif
2921
2922 taucmc(ig,lay) = ciwpmc(ig,lay) * abscoice(ig) + &
2923 clwpmc(ig,lay) * abscoliq(ig) + &
2924 cswpmc(ig,lay) * abscosno(ig)
2925
2926 endif
2927 endif
2928 enddo
2929 enddo
2930
2931 end subroutine cldprmc
2932
2933 end module rrtmg_lw_cldprmc
2934
2935! path: $Source: /cvsroot/NWP/WRFV3/phys/module_ra_rrtmg_lw.F,v $
2936! author: $Author: trn $
2937! revision: $Revision: 1.3 $
2938! created: $Date: 2009/04/16 19:54:22 $
2939!
2940 module rrtmg_lw_rtrnmc
2941
2942! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
2943! | |
2944! | Copyright 2002-2008, Atmospheric & Environmental Research, Inc. (AER). |
2945! | This software may be used, copied, or redistributed as long as it is |
2946! | not sold and this copyright notice is reproduced on each copy made. |
2947! | This model is provided as is without any express or implied warranties. |
2948! | (http://www.rtweb.aer.com/) |
2949! | |
2950! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
2951
2952! --------- Modules ----------
2953
2954 use parkind, only : im => kind_im, rb => kind_rb
2955 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw
2956 use rrlw_con, only: fluxfac, heatfac
2957 use rrlw_wvn, only: delwave, ngb, ngs
2958 use rrlw_tbl, only: tblint, bpade, tau_tbl, exp_tbl, tfn_tbl
2959 use rrlw_vsn, only: hvrrtc, hnamrtc
2960
2961 implicit none
2962
2963 real(kind=rb) :: wtdiff, rec_6
2964 real(kind=rb) :: a0(nbndlw),a1(nbndlw),a2(nbndlw)! diffusivity angle adjustment coefficients
2965
2966! This secant and weight corresponds to the standard diffusivity
2967! angle. This initial value is redefined below for some bands.
2968 data wtdiff /0.5_rb/
2969 data rec_6 /0.166667_rb/
2970
2971! Reset diffusivity angle for Bands 2-3 and 5-9 to vary (between 1.50
2972! and 1.80) as a function of total column water vapor. The function
2973! has been defined to minimize flux and cooling rate errors in these bands
2974! over a wide range of precipitable water values.
2975 data a0 / 1.66_rb, 1.55_rb, 1.58_rb, 1.66_rb, &
2976 1.54_rb, 1.454_rb, 1.89_rb, 1.33_rb, &
2977 1.668_rb, 1.66_rb, 1.66_rb, 1.66_rb, &
2978 1.66_rb, 1.66_rb, 1.66_rb, 1.66_rb /
2979 data a1 / 0.00_rb, 0.25_rb, 0.22_rb, 0.00_rb, &
2980 0.13_rb, 0.446_rb, -0.10_rb, 0.40_rb, &
2981 -0.006_rb, 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb, &
2982 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb /
2983 data a2 / 0.00_rb, -12.0_rb, -11.7_rb, 0.00_rb, &
2984 -0.72_rb,-0.243_rb, 0.19_rb,-0.062_rb, &
2985 0.414_rb, 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb, &
2986 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb, 0.00_rb /
2987
2988 contains
2989
2990!-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2991 subroutine rtrnmc(nlayers, istart, iend, iout, pz, semiss, ncbands, &
2992 cldfmc, taucmc, planklay, planklev, plankbnd, &
2993 pwvcm, fracs, taut, &
2994 totuflux, totdflux, fnet, htr, &
2995 totuclfl, totdclfl, fnetc, htrc )
2996!-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2997!
2998! Original version: E. J. Mlawer, et al. RRTM_V3.0
2999! Revision for GCMs: Michael J. Iacono; October, 2002
3000! Revision for F90: Michael J. Iacono; June, 2006
3001!
3002! This program calculates the upward fluxes, downward fluxes, and
3003! heating rates for an arbitrary clear or cloudy atmosphere. The input
3004! to this program is the atmospheric profile, all Planck function
3005! information, and the cloud fraction by layer. A variable diffusivity
3006! angle (SECDIFF) is used for the angle integration. Bands 2-3 and 5-9
3007! use a value for SECDIFF that varies from 1.50 to 1.80 as a function of
3008! the column water vapor, and other bands use a value of 1.66. The Gaussian
3009! weight appropriate to this angle (WTDIFF=0.5) is applied here. Note that
3010! use of the emissivity angle for the flux integration can cause errors of
3011! 1 to 4 W/m2 within cloudy layers.
3012! Clouds are treated with the McICA stochastic approach and maximum-random
3013! cloud overlap.
3014!***************************************************************************
3015
3016! ------- Declarations -------
3017
3018! ----- Input -----
3019 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: nlayers ! total number of layers
3020 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: istart ! beginning band of calculation
3021 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: iend ! ending band of calculation
3022 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: iout ! output option flag
3023
3024! Atmosphere
3025 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: pz(0:) ! level (interface) pressures (hPa, mb)
3026 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3027 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: pwvcm ! precipitable water vapor (cm)
3028 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: semiss(:) ! lw surface emissivity
3029 ! Dimensions: (nbndlw)
3030 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: planklay(:,:) !
3031 ! Dimensions: (nlayers,nbndlw)
3032 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: planklev(0:,:) !
3033 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers,nbndlw)
3034 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: plankbnd(:) !
3035 ! Dimensions: (nbndlw)
3036 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: fracs(:,:) !
3037 ! Dimensions: (nlayers,ngptw)
3038 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: taut(:,:) ! gaseous + aerosol optical depths
3039 ! Dimensions: (nlayers,ngptlw)
3040
3041! Clouds
3042 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: ncbands ! number of cloud spectral bands
3043 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cldfmc(:,:) ! layer cloud fraction [mcica]
3044 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,nlayers)
3045 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: taucmc(:,:) ! layer cloud optical depth [mcica]
3046 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,nlayers)
3047
3048! ----- Output -----
3049 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: totuflux(0:) ! upward longwave flux (w/m2)
3050 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3051 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: totdflux(0:) ! downward longwave flux (w/m2)
3052 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3053 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: fnet(0:) ! net longwave flux (w/m2)
3054 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3055 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: htr(0:) ! longwave heating rate (k/day)
3056 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3057 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: totuclfl(0:) ! clear sky upward longwave flux (w/m2)
3058 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3059 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: totdclfl(0:) ! clear sky downward longwave flux (w/m2)
3060 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3061 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: fnetc(0:) ! clear sky net longwave flux (w/m2)
3062 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3063 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: htrc(0:) ! clear sky longwave heating rate (k/day)
3064 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3065
3066! ----- Local -----
3067! Declarations for radiative transfer
3068 real(kind=rb) :: abscld(nlayers,ngptlw)
3069 real(kind=rb) :: atot(nlayers)
3070 real(kind=rb) :: atrans(nlayers)
3071 real(kind=rb) :: bbugas(nlayers)
3072 real(kind=rb) :: bbutot(nlayers)
3073 real(kind=rb) :: clrurad(0:nlayers)
3074 real(kind=rb) :: clrdrad(0:nlayers)
3075 real(kind=rb) :: efclfrac(nlayers,ngptlw)
3076 real(kind=rb) :: uflux(0:nlayers)
3077 real(kind=rb) :: dflux(0:nlayers)
3078 real(kind=rb) :: urad(0:nlayers)
3079 real(kind=rb) :: drad(0:nlayers)
3080 real(kind=rb) :: uclfl(0:nlayers)
3081 real(kind=rb) :: dclfl(0:nlayers)
3082 real(kind=rb) :: odcld(nlayers,ngptlw)
3083
3084
3085 real(kind=rb) :: secdiff(nbndlw) ! secant of diffusivity angle
3086 real(kind=rb) :: transcld, radld, radclrd, plfrac, blay, dplankup, dplankdn
3087 real(kind=rb) :: odepth, odtot, odepth_rec, odtot_rec, gassrc
3088 real(kind=rb) :: tblind, tfactot, bbd, bbdtot, tfacgas, transc, tausfac
3089 real(kind=rb) :: rad0, reflect, radlu, radclru
3090
3091 integer(kind=im) :: icldlyr(nlayers) ! flag for cloud in layer
3092 integer(kind=im) :: ibnd, ib, iband, lay, lev, l, ig ! loop indices
3093 integer(kind=im) :: igc ! g-point interval counter
3094 integer(kind=im) :: iclddn ! flag for cloud in down path
3095 integer(kind=im) :: ittot, itgas, itr ! lookup table indices
3096
3097! ------- Definitions -------
3098! input
3099! nlayers ! number of model layers
3100! ngptlw ! total number of g-point subintervals
3101! nbndlw ! number of longwave spectral bands
3102! ncbands ! number of spectral bands for clouds
3103! secdiff ! diffusivity angle
3104! wtdiff ! weight for radiance to flux conversion
3105! pavel ! layer pressures (mb)
3106! pz ! level (interface) pressures (mb)
3107! tavel ! layer temperatures (k)
3108! tz ! level (interface) temperatures(mb)
3109! tbound ! surface temperature (k)
3110! cldfrac ! layer cloud fraction
3111! taucloud ! layer cloud optical depth
3112! itr ! integer look-up table index
3113! icldlyr ! flag for cloudy layers
3114! iclddn ! flag for cloud in column at any layer
3115! semiss ! surface emissivities for each band
3116! reflect ! surface reflectance
3117! bpade ! 1/(pade constant)
3118! tau_tbl ! clear sky optical depth look-up table
3119! exp_tbl ! exponential look-up table for transmittance
3120! tfn_tbl ! tau transition function look-up table
3121
3122! local
3123! atrans ! gaseous absorptivity
3124! abscld ! cloud absorptivity
3125! atot ! combined gaseous and cloud absorptivity
3126! odclr ! clear sky (gaseous) optical depth
3127! odcld ! cloud optical depth
3128! odtot ! optical depth of gas and cloud
3129! tfacgas ! gas-only pade factor, used for planck fn
3130! tfactot ! gas and cloud pade factor, used for planck fn
3131! bbdgas ! gas-only planck function for downward rt
3132! bbugas ! gas-only planck function for upward rt
3133! bbdtot ! gas and cloud planck function for downward rt
3134! bbutot ! gas and cloud planck function for upward calc.
3135! gassrc ! source radiance due to gas only
3136! efclfrac ! effective cloud fraction
3137! radlu ! spectrally summed upward radiance
3138! radclru ! spectrally summed clear sky upward radiance
3139! urad ! upward radiance by layer
3140! clrurad ! clear sky upward radiance by layer
3141! radld ! spectrally summed downward radiance
3142! radclrd ! spectrally summed clear sky downward radiance
3143! drad ! downward radiance by layer
3144! clrdrad ! clear sky downward radiance by layer
3145
3146! output
3147! totuflux ! upward longwave flux (w/m2)
3148! totdflux ! downward longwave flux (w/m2)
3149! fnet ! net longwave flux (w/m2)
3150! htr ! longwave heating rate (k/day)
3151! totuclfl ! clear sky upward longwave flux (w/m2)
3152! totdclfl ! clear sky downward longwave flux (w/m2)
3153! fnetc ! clear sky net longwave flux (w/m2)
3154! htrc ! clear sky longwave heating rate (k/day)
3155
3156
3157!jm not thread safe hvrrtc = '$Revision: 1.3 $'
3158
3159 do ibnd = 1,nbndlw
3160 if (ibnd.eq.1 .or. ibnd.eq.4 .or. ibnd.ge.10) then
3161 secdiff(ibnd) = 1.66_rb
3162 else
3163 secdiff(ibnd) = a0(ibnd) + a1(ibnd)*exp(a2(ibnd)*pwvcm)
3164 if (secdiff(ibnd) .gt. 1.80_rb) secdiff(ibnd) = 1.80_rb
3165 if (secdiff(ibnd) .lt. 1.50_rb) secdiff(ibnd) = 1.50_rb
3166 endif
3167 enddo
3168
3169 urad(0) = 0.0_rb
3170 drad(0) = 0.0_rb
3171 totuflux(0) = 0.0_rb
3172 totdflux(0) = 0.0_rb
3173 clrurad(0) = 0.0_rb
3174 clrdrad(0) = 0.0_rb
3175 totuclfl(0) = 0.0_rb
3176 totdclfl(0) = 0.0_rb
3177
3178 do lay = 1, nlayers
3179 urad(lay) = 0.0_rb
3180 drad(lay) = 0.0_rb
3181 totuflux(lay) = 0.0_rb
3182 totdflux(lay) = 0.0_rb
3183 clrurad(lay) = 0.0_rb
3184 clrdrad(lay) = 0.0_rb
3185 totuclfl(lay) = 0.0_rb
3186 totdclfl(lay) = 0.0_rb
3187 icldlyr(lay) = 0
3188
3189! Change to band loop?
3190 do ig = 1, ngptlw
3191 if (cldfmc(ig,lay) .eq. 1._rb) then
3192 ib = ngb(ig)
3193 odcld(lay,ig) = secdiff(ib) * taucmc(ig,lay)
3194 transcld = exp(-odcld(lay,ig))
3195 abscld(lay,ig) = 1._rb - transcld
3196 efclfrac(lay,ig) = abscld(lay,ig) * cldfmc(ig,lay)
3197 icldlyr(lay) = 1
3198 else
3199 odcld(lay,ig) = 0.0_rb
3200 abscld(lay,ig) = 0.0_rb
3201 efclfrac(lay,ig) = 0.0_rb
3202 endif
3203 enddo
3204
3205 enddo
3206
3207 igc = 1
3208! Loop over frequency bands.
3209 do iband = istart, iend
3210
3211! Reinitialize g-point counter for each band if output for each band is requested.
3212 if (iout.gt.0.and.iband.ge.2) igc = ngs(iband-1)+1
3213
3214! Loop over g-channels.
3215 1000 continue
3216
3217! Radiative transfer starts here.
3218 radld = 0._rb
3219 radclrd = 0._rb
3220 iclddn = 0
3221
3222! Downward radiative transfer loop.
3223
3224 do lev = nlayers, 1, -1
3225 plfrac = fracs(lev,igc)
3226 blay = planklay(lev,iband)
3227 dplankup = planklev(lev,iband) - blay
3228 dplankdn = planklev(lev-1,iband) - blay
3229 odepth = secdiff(iband) * taut(lev,igc)
3230 if (odepth .lt. 0.0_rb) odepth = 0.0_rb
3231! Cloudy layer
3232 if (icldlyr(lev).eq.1) then
3233 iclddn = 1
3234 odtot = odepth + odcld(lev,igc)
3235 if (odtot .lt. 0.06_rb) then
3236 atrans(lev) = odepth - 0.5_rb*odepth*odepth
3237 odepth_rec = rec_6*odepth
3238 gassrc = plfrac*(blay+dplankdn*odepth_rec)*atrans(lev)
3239
3240 atot(lev) = odtot - 0.5_rb*odtot*odtot
3241 odtot_rec = rec_6*odtot
3242 bbdtot = plfrac * (blay+dplankdn*odtot_rec)
3243 bbd = plfrac*(blay+dplankdn*odepth_rec)
3244 radld = radld - radld * (atrans(lev) + &
3245 efclfrac(lev,igc) * (1. - atrans(lev))) + &
3246 gassrc + cldfmc(igc,lev) * &
3247 (bbdtot * atot(lev) - gassrc)
3248 drad(lev-1) = drad(lev-1) + radld
3249
3250 bbugas(lev) = plfrac * (blay+dplankup*odepth_rec)
3251 bbutot(lev) = plfrac * (blay+dplankup*odtot_rec)
3252
3253 elseif (odepth .le. 0.06_rb) then
3254 atrans(lev) = odepth - 0.5_rb*odepth*odepth
3255 odepth_rec = rec_6*odepth
3256 gassrc = plfrac*(blay+dplankdn*odepth_rec)*atrans(lev)
3257
3258 odtot = odepth + odcld(lev,igc)
3259 tblind = odtot/(bpade+odtot)
3260 ittot = tblint*tblind + 0.5_rb
3261 tfactot = tfn_tbl(ittot)
3262 bbdtot = plfrac * (blay + tfactot*dplankdn)
3263 bbd = plfrac*(blay+dplankdn*odepth_rec)
3264 atot(lev) = 1. - exp_tbl(ittot)
3265
3266 radld = radld - radld * (atrans(lev) + &
3267 efclfrac(lev,igc) * (1._rb - atrans(lev))) + &
3268 gassrc + cldfmc(igc,lev) * &
3269 (bbdtot * atot(lev) - gassrc)
3270 drad(lev-1) = drad(lev-1) + radld
3271
3272 bbugas(lev) = plfrac * (blay + dplankup*odepth_rec)
3273 bbutot(lev) = plfrac * (blay + tfactot * dplankup)
3274
3275 else
3276
3277 tblind = odepth/(bpade+odepth)
3278 itgas = tblint*tblind+0.5_rb
3279 odepth = tau_tbl(itgas)
3280 atrans(lev) = 1._rb - exp_tbl(itgas)
3281 tfacgas = tfn_tbl(itgas)
3282 gassrc = atrans(lev) * plfrac * (blay + tfacgas*dplankdn)
3283
3284 odtot = odepth + odcld(lev,igc)
3285 tblind = odtot/(bpade+odtot)
3286 ittot = tblint*tblind + 0.5_rb
3287 tfactot = tfn_tbl(ittot)
3288 bbdtot = plfrac * (blay + tfactot*dplankdn)
3289 bbd = plfrac*(blay+tfacgas*dplankdn)
3290 atot(lev) = 1._rb - exp_tbl(ittot)
3291
3292 radld = radld - radld * (atrans(lev) + &
3293 efclfrac(lev,igc) * (1._rb - atrans(lev))) + &
3294 gassrc + cldfmc(igc,lev) * &
3295 (bbdtot * atot(lev) - gassrc)
3296 drad(lev-1) = drad(lev-1) + radld
3297 bbugas(lev) = plfrac * (blay + tfacgas * dplankup)
3298 bbutot(lev) = plfrac * (blay + tfactot * dplankup)
3299 endif
3300! Clear layer
3301 else
3302 if (odepth .le. 0.06_rb) then
3303 atrans(lev) = odepth-0.5_rb*odepth*odepth
3304 odepth = rec_6*odepth
3305 bbd = plfrac*(blay+dplankdn*odepth)
3306 bbugas(lev) = plfrac*(blay+dplankup*odepth)
3307 else
3308 tblind = odepth/(bpade+odepth)
3309 itr = tblint*tblind+0.5_rb
3310 transc = exp_tbl(itr)
3311 atrans(lev) = 1._rb-transc
3312 tausfac = tfn_tbl(itr)
3313 bbd = plfrac*(blay+tausfac*dplankdn)
3314 bbugas(lev) = plfrac * (blay + tausfac * dplankup)
3315 endif
3316 radld = radld + (bbd-radld)*atrans(lev)
3317 drad(lev-1) = drad(lev-1) + radld
3318 endif
3319! Set clear sky stream to total sky stream as long as layers
3320! remain clear. Streams diverge when a cloud is reached (iclddn=1),
3321! and clear sky stream must be computed separately from that point.
3322 if (iclddn.eq.1) then
3323 radclrd = radclrd + (bbd-radclrd) * atrans(lev)
3324 clrdrad(lev-1) = clrdrad(lev-1) + radclrd
3325 else
3326 radclrd = radld
3327 clrdrad(lev-1) = drad(lev-1)
3328 endif
3329 enddo
3330
3331! Spectral emissivity & reflectance
3332! Include the contribution of spectrally varying longwave emissivity
3333! and reflection from the surface to the upward radiative transfer.
3334! Note: Spectral and Lambertian reflection are identical for the
3335! diffusivity angle flux integration used here.
3336
3337 rad0 = fracs(1,igc) * plankbnd(iband)
3338! Add in specular reflection of surface downward radiance.
3339 reflect = 1._rb - semiss(iband)
3340 radlu = rad0 + reflect * radld
3341 radclru = rad0 + reflect * radclrd
3342
3343
3344! Upward radiative transfer loop.
3345 urad(0) = urad(0) + radlu
3346 clrurad(0) = clrurad(0) + radclru
3347
3348 do lev = 1, nlayers
3349! Cloudy layer
3350 if (icldlyr(lev) .eq. 1) then
3351 gassrc = bbugas(lev) * atrans(lev)
3352 radlu = radlu - radlu * (atrans(lev) + &
3353 efclfrac(lev,igc) * (1._rb - atrans(lev))) + &
3354 gassrc + cldfmc(igc,lev) * &
3355 (bbutot(lev) * atot(lev) - gassrc)
3356 urad(lev) = urad(lev) + radlu
3357! Clear layer
3358 else
3359 radlu = radlu + (bbugas(lev)-radlu)*atrans(lev)
3360 urad(lev) = urad(lev) + radlu
3361 endif
3362! Set clear sky stream to total sky stream as long as all layers
3363! are clear (iclddn=0). Streams must be calculated separately at
3364! all layers when a cloud is present (ICLDDN=1), because surface
3365! reflectance is different for each stream.
3366 if (iclddn.eq.1) then
3367 radclru = radclru + (bbugas(lev)-radclru)*atrans(lev)
3368 clrurad(lev) = clrurad(lev) + radclru
3369 else
3370 radclru = radlu
3371 clrurad(lev) = urad(lev)
3372 endif
3373 enddo
3374
3375! Increment g-point counter
3376 igc = igc + 1
3377! Return to continue radiative transfer for all g-channels in present band
3378 if (igc .le. ngs(iband)) go to 1000
3379
3380! Process longwave output from band for total and clear streams.
3381! Calculate upward, downward, and net flux.
3382 do lev = nlayers, 0, -1
3383 uflux(lev) = urad(lev)*wtdiff
3384 dflux(lev) = drad(lev)*wtdiff
3385 urad(lev) = 0.0_rb
3386 drad(lev) = 0.0_rb
3387 totuflux(lev) = totuflux(lev) + uflux(lev) * delwave(iband)
3388 totdflux(lev) = totdflux(lev) + dflux(lev) * delwave(iband)
3389 uclfl(lev) = clrurad(lev)*wtdiff
3390 dclfl(lev) = clrdrad(lev)*wtdiff
3391 clrurad(lev) = 0.0_rb
3392 clrdrad(lev) = 0.0_rb
3393 totuclfl(lev) = totuclfl(lev) + uclfl(lev) * delwave(iband)
3394 totdclfl(lev) = totdclfl(lev) + dclfl(lev) * delwave(iband)
3395 enddo
3396
3397! End spectral band loop
3398 enddo
3399
3400! Calculate fluxes at surface
3401 totuflux(0) = totuflux(0) * fluxfac
3402 totdflux(0) = totdflux(0) * fluxfac
3403 fnet(0) = totuflux(0) - totdflux(0)
3404 totuclfl(0) = totuclfl(0) * fluxfac
3405 totdclfl(0) = totdclfl(0) * fluxfac
3406 fnetc(0) = totuclfl(0) - totdclfl(0)
3407
3408! Calculate fluxes at model levels
3409 do lev = 1, nlayers
3410 totuflux(lev) = totuflux(lev) * fluxfac
3411 totdflux(lev) = totdflux(lev) * fluxfac
3412 fnet(lev) = totuflux(lev) - totdflux(lev)
3413 totuclfl(lev) = totuclfl(lev) * fluxfac
3414 totdclfl(lev) = totdclfl(lev) * fluxfac
3415 fnetc(lev) = totuclfl(lev) - totdclfl(lev)
3416 l = lev - 1
3417
3418! Calculate heating rates at model layers
3419 htr(l)=heatfac*(fnet(l)-fnet(lev))/(pz(l)-pz(lev))
3420 htrc(l)=heatfac*(fnetc(l)-fnetc(lev))/(pz(l)-pz(lev))
3421 enddo
3422
3423! Set heating rate to zero in top layer
3424 htr(nlayers) = 0.0_rb
3425 htrc(nlayers) = 0.0_rb
3426
3427 end subroutine rtrnmc
3428
3429 end module rrtmg_lw_rtrnmc
3430
3431! path: $Source: /cvsroot/NWP/WRFV3/phys/module_ra_rrtmg_lw.F,v $
3432! author: $Author: trn $
3433! revision: $Revision: 1.3 $
3434! created: $Date: 2009/04/16 19:54:22 $
3435!
3436 module rrtmg_lw_setcoef
3437
3438! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
3439! | |
3440! | Copyright 2002-2008, Atmospheric & Environmental Research, Inc. (AER). |
3441! | This software may be used, copied, or redistributed as long as it is |
3442! | not sold and this copyright notice is reproduced on each copy made. |
3443! | This model is provided as is without any express or implied warranties. |
3444! | (http://www.rtweb.aer.com/) |
3445! | |
3446! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
3447
3448! ------- Modules -------
3449
3450 use parkind, only : im => kind_im, rb => kind_rb
3451 use parrrtm, only : nbndlw, mg, maxxsec, mxmol
3452 use rrlw_wvn, only: totplnk, totplk16
3453 use rrlw_ref
3454 use rrlw_vsn, only: hvrset, hnamset
3455
3456 implicit none
3457
3458 contains
3459
3460!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
3461 subroutine setcoef(nlayers, istart, pavel, tavel, tz, tbound, semiss, &
3462 coldry, wkl, wbroad, &
3463 laytrop, jp, jt, jt1, planklay, planklev, plankbnd, &
3464 colh2o, colco2, colo3, coln2o, colco, colch4, colo2, &
3465 colbrd, fac00, fac01, fac10, fac11, &
3466 rat_h2oco2, rat_h2oco2_1, rat_h2oo3, rat_h2oo3_1, &
3467 rat_h2on2o, rat_h2on2o_1, rat_h2och4, rat_h2och4_1, &
3468 rat_n2oco2, rat_n2oco2_1, rat_o3co2, rat_o3co2_1, &
3469 selffac, selffrac, indself, forfac, forfrac, indfor, &
3470 minorfrac, scaleminor, scaleminorn2, indminor)
3471!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
3472!
3473! Purpose: For a given atmosphere, calculate the indices and
3474! fractions related to the pressure and temperature interpolations.
3475! Also calculate the values of the integrated Planck functions
3476! for each band at the level and layer temperatures.
3477
3478! ------- Declarations -------
3479
3480! ----- Input -----
3481 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: nlayers ! total number of layers
3482 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: istart ! beginning band of calculation
3483
3484 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: pavel(:) ! layer pressures (mb)
3485 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3486 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tavel(:) ! layer temperatures (K)
3487 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3488 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tz(0:) ! level (interface) temperatures (K)
3489 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers)
3490 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tbound ! surface temperature (K)
3491 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: coldry(:) ! dry air column density (mol/cm2)
3492 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3493 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: wbroad(:) ! broadening gas column density (mol/cm2)
3494 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3495 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: wkl(:,:) ! molecular amounts (mol/cm-2)
3496 ! Dimensions: (mxmol,nlayers)
3497 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: semiss(:) ! lw surface emissivity
3498 ! Dimensions: (nbndlw)
3499
3500! ----- Output -----
3501 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: laytrop ! tropopause layer index
3502 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: jp(:) !
3503 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3504 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: jt(:) !
3505 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3506 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: jt1(:) !
3507 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3508 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: planklay(:,:) !
3509 ! Dimensions: (nlayers,nbndlw)
3510 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: planklev(0:,:) !
3511 ! Dimensions: (0:nlayers,nbndlw)
3512 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: plankbnd(:) !
3513 ! Dimensions: (nbndlw)
3514
3515 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: colh2o(:) ! column amount (h2o)
3516 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3517 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: colco2(:) ! column amount (co2)
3518 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3519 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: colo3(:) ! column amount (o3)
3520 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3521 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: coln2o(:) ! column amount (n2o)
3522 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3523 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: colco(:) ! column amount (co)
3524 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3525 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: colch4(:) ! column amount (ch4)
3526 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3527 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: colo2(:) ! column amount (o2)
3528 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3529 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: colbrd(:) ! column amount (broadening gases)
3530 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3531
3532 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: indself(:)
3533 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3534 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: indfor(:)
3535 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3536 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: selffac(:)
3537 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3538 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: selffrac(:)
3539 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3540 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: forfac(:)
3541 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3542 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: forfrac(:)
3543 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3544
3545 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: indminor(:)
3546 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3547 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: minorfrac(:)
3548 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3549 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: scaleminor(:)
3550 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3551 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: scaleminorn2(:)
3552 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3553
3554 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: & !
3555 fac00(:), fac01(:), & ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3556 fac10(:), fac11(:)
3557
3558 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: & !
3559 rat_h2oco2(:),rat_h2oco2_1(:), &
3560 rat_h2oo3(:),rat_h2oo3_1(:), & ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
3561 rat_h2on2o(:),rat_h2on2o_1(:), &
3562 rat_h2och4(:),rat_h2och4_1(:), &
3563 rat_n2oco2(:),rat_n2oco2_1(:), &
3564 rat_o3co2(:),rat_o3co2_1(:)
3565
3566
3567! ----- Local -----
3568 integer(kind=im) :: indbound, indlev0
3569 integer(kind=im) :: lay, indlay, indlev, iband
3570 integer(kind=im) :: jp1
3571 real(kind=rb) :: stpfac, tbndfrac, t0frac, tlayfrac, tlevfrac
3572 real(kind=rb) :: dbdtlev, dbdtlay
3573 real(kind=rb) :: plog, fp, ft, ft1, water, scalefac, factor, compfp
3574
3575
3576!jm not thread safe hvrset = '$Revision: 1.3 $'
3577
3578 stpfac = 296._rb/1013._rb
3579
3580 indbound = tbound - 159._rb
3581 if (indbound .lt. 1) then
3582 indbound = 1
3583 elseif (indbound .gt. 180) then
3584 indbound = 180
3585 endif
3586 tbndfrac = tbound - 159._rb - float(indbound)
3587 indlev0 = tz(0) - 159._rb
3588 if (indlev0 .lt. 1) then
3589 indlev0 = 1
3590 elseif (indlev0 .gt. 180) then
3591 indlev0 = 180
3592 endif
3593 t0frac = tz(0) - 159._rb - float(indlev0)
3594 laytrop = 0
3595
3596! Begin layer loop
3597! Calculate the integrated Planck functions for each band at the
3598! surface, level, and layer temperatures.
3599 do lay = 1, nlayers
3600 indlay = tavel(lay) - 159._rb
3601 if (indlay .lt. 1) then
3602 indlay = 1
3603 elseif (indlay .gt. 180) then
3604 indlay = 180
3605 endif
3606 tlayfrac = tavel(lay) - 159._rb - float(indlay)
3607 indlev = tz(lay) - 159._rb
3608 if (indlev .lt. 1) then
3609 indlev = 1
3610 elseif (indlev .gt. 180) then
3611 indlev = 180
3612 endif
3613 tlevfrac = tz(lay) - 159._rb - float(indlev)
3614
3615! Begin spectral band loop
3616 do iband = 1, 15
3617 if (lay.eq.1) then
3618 dbdtlev = totplnk(indbound+1,iband) - totplnk(indbound,iband)
3619 plankbnd(iband) = semiss(iband) * &
3620 (totplnk(indbound,iband) + tbndfrac * dbdtlev)
3621 dbdtlev = totplnk(indlev0+1,iband)-totplnk(indlev0,iband)
3622 planklev(0,iband) = totplnk(indlev0,iband) + t0frac * dbdtlev
3623 endif
3624 dbdtlev = totplnk(indlev+1,iband) - totplnk(indlev,iband)
3625 dbdtlay = totplnk(indlay+1,iband) - totplnk(indlay,iband)
3626 planklay(lay,iband) = totplnk(indlay,iband) + tlayfrac * dbdtlay
3627 planklev(lay,iband) = totplnk(indlev,iband) + tlevfrac * dbdtlev
3628 enddo
3629
3630! For band 16, if radiative transfer will be performed on just
3631! this band, use integrated Planck values up to 3250 cm-1.
3632! If radiative transfer will be performed across all 16 bands,
3633! then include in the integrated Planck values for this band
3634! contributions from 2600 cm-1 to infinity.
3635 iband = 16
3636 if (istart .eq. 16) then
3637 if (lay.eq.1) then
3638 dbdtlev = totplk16(indbound+1) - totplk16(indbound)
3639 plankbnd(iband) = semiss(iband) * &
3640 (totplk16(indbound) + tbndfrac * dbdtlev)
3641 dbdtlev = totplnk(indlev0+1,iband)-totplnk(indlev0,iband)
3642 planklev(0,iband) = totplk16(indlev0) + &
3643 t0frac * dbdtlev
3644 endif
3645 dbdtlev = totplk16(indlev+1) - totplk16(indlev)
3646 dbdtlay = totplk16(indlay+1) - totplk16(indlay)
3647 planklay(lay,iband) = totplk16(indlay) + tlayfrac * dbdtlay
3648 planklev(lay,iband) = totplk16(indlev) + tlevfrac * dbdtlev
3649 else
3650 if (lay.eq.1) then
3651 dbdtlev = totplnk(indbound+1,iband) - totplnk(indbound,iband)
3652 plankbnd(iband) = semiss(iband) * &
3653 (totplnk(indbound,iband) + tbndfrac * dbdtlev)
3654 dbdtlev = totplnk(indlev0+1,iband)-totplnk(indlev0,iband)
3655 planklev(0,iband) = totplnk(indlev0,iband) + t0frac * dbdtlev
3656 endif
3657 dbdtlev = totplnk(indlev+1,iband) - totplnk(indlev,iband)
3658 dbdtlay = totplnk(indlay+1,iband) - totplnk(indlay,iband)
3659 planklay(lay,iband) = totplnk(indlay,iband) + tlayfrac * dbdtlay
3660 planklev(lay,iband) = totplnk(indlev,iband) + tlevfrac * dbdtlev
3661 endif
3662
3663! Find the two reference pressures on either side of the
3664! layer pressure. Store them in JP and JP1. Store in FP the
3665! fraction of the difference (in ln(pressure)) between these
3666! two values that the layer pressure lies.
3667 plog = log(pavel(lay))
3668! plog = dlog(pavel(lay))
3669 jp(lay) = int(36._rb - 5*(plog+0.04_rb))
3670 if (jp(lay) .lt. 1) then
3671 jp(lay) = 1
3672 elseif (jp(lay) .gt. 58) then
3673 jp(lay) = 58
3674 endif
3675 jp1 = jp(lay) + 1
3676 fp = 5._rb *(preflog(jp(lay)) - plog)
3677
3678! Determine, for each reference pressure (JP and JP1), which
3679! reference temperature (these are different for each
3680! reference pressure) is nearest the layer temperature but does
3681! not exceed it. Store these indices in JT and JT1, resp.
3682! Store in FT (resp. FT1) the fraction of the way between JT
3683! (JT1) and the next highest reference temperature that the
3684! layer temperature falls.
3685 jt(lay) = int(3._rb + (tavel(lay)-tref(jp(lay)))/15._rb)
3686 if (jt(lay) .lt. 1) then
3687 jt(lay) = 1
3688 elseif (jt(lay) .gt. 4) then
3689 jt(lay) = 4
3690 endif
3691 ft = ((tavel(lay)-tref(jp(lay)))/15._rb) - float(jt(lay)-3)
3692 jt1(lay) = int(3._rb + (tavel(lay)-tref(jp1))/15._rb)
3693 if (jt1(lay) .lt. 1) then
3694 jt1(lay) = 1
3695 elseif (jt1(lay) .gt. 4) then
3696 jt1(lay) = 4
3697 endif
3698 ft1 = ((tavel(lay)-tref(jp1))/15._rb) - float(jt1(lay)-3)
3699 water = wkl(1,lay)/coldry(lay)
3700 scalefac = pavel(lay) * stpfac / tavel(lay)
3701
3702! If the pressure is less than ~100mb, perform a different
3703! set of species interpolations.
3704 if (plog .le. 4.56_rb) go to 5300
3705 laytrop = laytrop + 1
3706
3707 forfac(lay) = scalefac / (1.+water)
3708 factor = (332.0_rb-tavel(lay))/36.0_rb
3709 indfor(lay) = min(2, max(1, int(factor)))
3710 forfrac(lay) = factor - float(indfor(lay))
3711
3712! Set up factors needed to separately include the water vapor
3713! self-continuum in the calculation of absorption coefficient.
3714 selffac(lay) = water * forfac(lay)
3715 factor = (tavel(lay)-188.0_rb)/7.2_rb
3716 indself(lay) = min(9, max(1, int(factor)-7))
3717 selffrac(lay) = factor - float(indself(lay) + 7)
3718
3719! Set up factors needed to separately include the minor gases
3720! in the calculation of absorption coefficient
3721 scaleminor(lay) = pavel(lay)/tavel(lay)
3722 scaleminorn2(lay) = (pavel(lay)/tavel(lay)) &
3723 *(wbroad(lay)/(coldry(lay)+wkl(1,lay)))
3724 factor = (tavel(lay)-180.8_rb)/7.2_rb
3725 indminor(lay) = min(18, max(1, int(factor)))
3726 minorfrac(lay) = factor - float(indminor(lay))
3727
3728! Setup reference ratio to be used in calculation of binary
3729! species parameter in lower atmosphere.
3730 rat_h2oco2(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay))/chi_mls(2,jp(lay))
3731 rat_h2oco2_1(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay)+1)/chi_mls(2,jp(lay)+1)
3732
3733 rat_h2oo3(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay))/chi_mls(3,jp(lay))
3734 rat_h2oo3_1(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay)+1)/chi_mls(3,jp(lay)+1)
3735
3736 rat_h2on2o(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay))/chi_mls(4,jp(lay))
3737 rat_h2on2o_1(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay)+1)/chi_mls(4,jp(lay)+1)
3738
3739 rat_h2och4(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay))/chi_mls(6,jp(lay))
3740 rat_h2och4_1(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay)+1)/chi_mls(6,jp(lay)+1)
3741
3742 rat_n2oco2(lay)=chi_mls(4,jp(lay))/chi_mls(2,jp(lay))
3743 rat_n2oco2_1(lay)=chi_mls(4,jp(lay)+1)/chi_mls(2,jp(lay)+1)
3744
3745! Calculate needed column amounts.
3746 colh2o(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(1,lay)
3747 colco2(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(2,lay)
3748 colo3(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(3,lay)
3749 coln2o(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(4,lay)
3750 colco(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(5,lay)
3751 colch4(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(6,lay)
3752 colo2(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(7,lay)
3753 if (colco2(lay) .eq. 0._rb) colco2(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3754 if (colo3(lay) .eq. 0._rb) colo3(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3755 if (coln2o(lay) .eq. 0._rb) coln2o(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3756 if (colco(lay) .eq. 0._rb) colco(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3757 if (colch4(lay) .eq. 0._rb) colch4(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3758 colbrd(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wbroad(lay)
3759 go to 5400
3760
3761! Above laytrop.
3762 5300 continue
3763
3764 forfac(lay) = scalefac / (1.+water)
3765 factor = (tavel(lay)-188.0_rb)/36.0_rb
3766 indfor(lay) = 3
3767 forfrac(lay) = factor - 1.0_rb
3768
3769! Set up factors needed to separately include the water vapor
3770! self-continuum in the calculation of absorption coefficient.
3771 selffac(lay) = water * forfac(lay)
3772
3773! Set up factors needed to separately include the minor gases
3774! in the calculation of absorption coefficient
3775 scaleminor(lay) = pavel(lay)/tavel(lay)
3776 scaleminorn2(lay) = (pavel(lay)/tavel(lay)) &
3777 * (wbroad(lay)/(coldry(lay)+wkl(1,lay)))
3778 factor = (tavel(lay)-180.8_rb)/7.2_rb
3779 indminor(lay) = min(18, max(1, int(factor)))
3780 minorfrac(lay) = factor - float(indminor(lay))
3781
3782! Setup reference ratio to be used in calculation of binary
3783! species parameter in upper atmosphere.
3784 rat_h2oco2(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay))/chi_mls(2,jp(lay))
3785 rat_h2oco2_1(lay)=chi_mls(1,jp(lay)+1)/chi_mls(2,jp(lay)+1)
3786
3787 rat_o3co2(lay)=chi_mls(3,jp(lay))/chi_mls(2,jp(lay))
3788 rat_o3co2_1(lay)=chi_mls(3,jp(lay)+1)/chi_mls(2,jp(lay)+1)
3789
3790! Calculate needed column amounts.
3791 colh2o(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(1,lay)
3792 colco2(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(2,lay)
3793 colo3(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(3,lay)
3794 coln2o(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(4,lay)
3795 colco(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(5,lay)
3796 colch4(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(6,lay)
3797 colo2(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wkl(7,lay)
3798 if (colco2(lay) .eq. 0._rb) colco2(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3799 if (colo3(lay) .eq. 0._rb) colo3(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3800 if (coln2o(lay) .eq. 0._rb) coln2o(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3801 if (colco(lay) .eq. 0._rb) colco(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3802 if (colch4(lay) .eq. 0._rb) colch4(lay) = 1.e-32_rb * coldry(lay)
3803 colbrd(lay) = 1.e-20_rb * wbroad(lay)
3804 5400 continue
3805
3806! We have now isolated the layer ln pressure and temperature,
3807! between two reference pressures and two reference temperatures
3808! (for each reference pressure). We multiply the pressure
3809! fraction FP with the appropriate temperature fractions to get
3810! the factors that will be needed for the interpolation that yields
3811! the optical depths (performed in routines TAUGBn for band n).`
3812
3813 compfp = 1. - fp
3814 fac10(lay) = compfp * ft
3815 fac00(lay) = compfp * (1._rb - ft)
3816 fac11(lay) = fp * ft1
3817 fac01(lay) = fp * (1._rb - ft1)
3818
3819! Rescale selffac and forfac for use in taumol
3820 selffac(lay) = colh2o(lay)*selffac(lay)
3821 forfac(lay) = colh2o(lay)*forfac(lay)
3822
3823! End layer loop
3824 enddo
3825
3826 end subroutine setcoef
3827
3828!***************************************************************************
3829 subroutine lwatmref
3830!***************************************************************************
3831
3832 save
3833
3834! These pressures are chosen such that the ln of the first pressure
3835! has only a few non-zero digits (i.e. ln(PREF(1)) = 6.96000) and
3836! each subsequent ln(pressure) differs from the previous one by 0.2.
3837
3838 pref(:) = (/ &
3839 1.05363e+03_rb,8.62642e+02_rb,7.06272e+02_rb,5.78246e+02_rb,4.73428e+02_rb, &
3840 3.87610e+02_rb,3.17348e+02_rb,2.59823e+02_rb,2.12725e+02_rb,1.74164e+02_rb, &
3841 1.42594e+02_rb,1.16746e+02_rb,9.55835e+01_rb,7.82571e+01_rb,6.40715e+01_rb, &
3842 5.24573e+01_rb,4.29484e+01_rb,3.51632e+01_rb,2.87892e+01_rb,2.35706e+01_rb, &
3843 1.92980e+01_rb,1.57998e+01_rb,1.29358e+01_rb,1.05910e+01_rb,8.67114e+00_rb, &
3844 7.09933e+00_rb,5.81244e+00_rb,4.75882e+00_rb,3.89619e+00_rb,3.18993e+00_rb, &
3845 2.61170e+00_rb,2.13828e+00_rb,1.75067e+00_rb,1.43333e+00_rb,1.17351e+00_rb, &
3846 9.60789e-01_rb,7.86628e-01_rb,6.44036e-01_rb,5.27292e-01_rb,4.31710e-01_rb, &
3847 3.53455e-01_rb,2.89384e-01_rb,2.36928e-01_rb,1.93980e-01_rb,1.58817e-01_rb, &
3848 1.30029e-01_rb,1.06458e-01_rb,8.71608e-02_rb,7.13612e-02_rb,5.84256e-02_rb, &
3849 4.78349e-02_rb,3.91639e-02_rb,3.20647e-02_rb,2.62523e-02_rb,2.14936e-02_rb, &
3850 1.75975e-02_rb,1.44076e-02_rb,1.17959e-02_rb,9.65769e-03_rb/)
3851
3852 preflog(:) = (/ &
3853 6.9600e+00_rb, 6.7600e+00_rb, 6.5600e+00_rb, 6.3600e+00_rb, 6.1600e+00_rb, &
3854 5.9600e+00_rb, 5.7600e+00_rb, 5.5600e+00_rb, 5.3600e+00_rb, 5.1600e+00_rb, &
3855 4.9600e+00_rb, 4.7600e+00_rb, 4.5600e+00_rb, 4.3600e+00_rb, 4.1600e+00_rb, &
3856 3.9600e+00_rb, 3.7600e+00_rb, 3.5600e+00_rb, 3.3600e+00_rb, 3.1600e+00_rb, &
3857 2.9600e+00_rb, 2.7600e+00_rb, 2.5600e+00_rb, 2.3600e+00_rb, 2.1600e+00_rb, &
3858 1.9600e+00_rb, 1.7600e+00_rb, 1.5600e+00_rb, 1.3600e+00_rb, 1.1600e+00_rb, &
3859 9.6000e-01_rb, 7.6000e-01_rb, 5.6000e-01_rb, 3.6000e-01_rb, 1.6000e-01_rb, &
3860 -4.0000e-02_rb,-2.4000e-01_rb,-4.4000e-01_rb,-6.4000e-01_rb,-8.4000e-01_rb, &
3861 -1.0400e+00_rb,-1.2400e+00_rb,-1.4400e+00_rb,-1.6400e+00_rb,-1.8400e+00_rb, &
3862 -2.0400e+00_rb,-2.2400e+00_rb,-2.4400e+00_rb,-2.6400e+00_rb,-2.8400e+00_rb, &
3863 -3.0400e+00_rb,-3.2400e+00_rb,-3.4400e+00_rb,-3.6400e+00_rb,-3.8400e+00_rb, &
3864 -4.0400e+00_rb,-4.2400e+00_rb,-4.4400e+00_rb,-4.6400e+00_rb/)
3865
3866! These are the temperatures associated with the respective
3867! pressures for the mls standard atmosphere.
3868
3869 tref(:) = (/ &
3870 2.9420e+02_rb, 2.8799e+02_rb, 2.7894e+02_rb, 2.6925e+02_rb, 2.5983e+02_rb, &
3871 2.5017e+02_rb, 2.4077e+02_rb, 2.3179e+02_rb, 2.2306e+02_rb, 2.1578e+02_rb, &
3872 2.1570e+02_rb, 2.1570e+02_rb, 2.1570e+02_rb, 2.1706e+02_rb, 2.1858e+02_rb, &
3873 2.2018e+02_rb, 2.2174e+02_rb, 2.2328e+02_rb, 2.2479e+02_rb, 2.2655e+02_rb, &
3874 2.2834e+02_rb, 2.3113e+02_rb, 2.3401e+02_rb, 2.3703e+02_rb, 2.4022e+02_rb, &
3875 2.4371e+02_rb, 2.4726e+02_rb, 2.5085e+02_rb, 2.5457e+02_rb, 2.5832e+02_rb, &
3876 2.6216e+02_rb, 2.6606e+02_rb, 2.6999e+02_rb, 2.7340e+02_rb, 2.7536e+02_rb, &
3877 2.7568e+02_rb, 2.7372e+02_rb, 2.7163e+02_rb, 2.6955e+02_rb, 2.6593e+02_rb, &
3878 2.6211e+02_rb, 2.5828e+02_rb, 2.5360e+02_rb, 2.4854e+02_rb, 2.4348e+02_rb, &

4715
4716! ------- Modules -------
4717
4718 use parkind, only : im => kind_im, rb => kind_rb
4719 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, maxxsec, ngptlw
4720 use rrlw_con, only: oneminus
4721 use rrlw_wvn, only: nspa, nspb
4722 use rrlw_vsn, only: hvrtau, hnamtau
4723
4724 implicit none
4725
4726 contains
4727
4728!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4729 subroutine taumol(nlayers, pavel, wx, coldry, &
4730 laytrop, jp, jt, jt1, planklay, planklev, plankbnd, &
4731 colh2o, colco2, colo3, coln2o, colco, colch4, colo2, &
4732 colbrd, fac00, fac01, fac10, fac11, &
4733 rat_h2oco2, rat_h2oco2_1, rat_h2oo3, rat_h2oo3_1, &
4734 rat_h2on2o, rat_h2on2o_1, rat_h2och4, rat_h2och4_1, &
4735 rat_n2oco2, rat_n2oco2_1, rat_o3co2, rat_o3co2_1, &
4736 selffac, selffrac, indself, forfac, forfrac, indfor, &
4737 minorfrac, scaleminor, scaleminorn2, indminor, &
4738 fracs, taug)
4739!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4740
4741! *******************************************************************************
4742! * *
4743! * Optical depths developed for the *
4744! * *
4745! * RAPID RADIATIVE TRANSFER MODEL (RRTM) *
4746! * *
4747! * *
4748! * ATMOSPHERIC AND ENVIRONMENTAL RESEARCH, INC. *
4749! * 131 HARTWELL AVENUE *
4750! * LEXINGTON, MA 02421 *
4751! * *
4752! * *
4753! * ELI J. MLAWER *
4754! * JENNIFER DELAMERE *
4755! * STEVEN J. TAUBMAN *
4756! * SHEPARD A. CLOUGH *
4757! * *
4758! * *
4759! * *
4760! * *
4761! * email: mlawer@aer.com *
4762! * email: jdelamer@aer.com *
4763! * *
4764! * The authors wish to acknowledge the contributions of the *
4765! * following people: Karen Cady-Pereira, Patrick D. Brown, *
4766! * Michael J. Iacono, Ronald E. Farren, Luke Chen, Robert Bergstrom. *
4767! * *
4768! *******************************************************************************
4769! * *
4770! * Revision for g-point reduction: Michael J. Iacono, AER, Inc. *
4771! * *
4772! *******************************************************************************
4773! * TAUMOL *
4774! * *
4775! * This file contains the subroutines TAUGBn (where n goes from *
4776! * 1 to 16). TAUGBn calculates the optical depths and Planck fractions *
4777! * per g-value and layer for band n. *
4778! * *
4779! * Output: optical depths (unitless) *
4780! * fractions needed to compute Planck functions at every layer *
4781! * and g-value *
4782! * *
4783! * COMMON /TAUGCOM/ TAUG(MXLAY,MG) *
4784! * COMMON /PLANKG/ FRACS(MXLAY,MG) *
4785! * *
4786! * Input *
4787! * *
4788! * COMMON /FEATURES/ NG(NBANDS),NSPA(NBANDS),NSPB(NBANDS) *
4789! * COMMON /PRECISE/ ONEMINUS *
4790! * COMMON /PROFILE/ NLAYERS,PAVEL(MXLAY),TAVEL(MXLAY), *
4791! * & PZ(0:MXLAY),TZ(0:MXLAY) *
4792! * COMMON /PROFDATA/ LAYTROP, *
4793! * & COLH2O(MXLAY),COLCO2(MXLAY),COLO3(MXLAY), *
4794! * & COLN2O(MXLAY),COLCO(MXLAY),COLCH4(MXLAY), *
4795! * & COLO2(MXLAY)
4796! * COMMON /INTFAC/ FAC00(MXLAY),FAC01(MXLAY), *
4797! * & FAC10(MXLAY),FAC11(MXLAY) *
4798! * COMMON /INTIND/ JP(MXLAY),JT(MXLAY),JT1(MXLAY) *
4799! * COMMON /SELF/ SELFFAC(MXLAY), SELFFRAC(MXLAY), INDSELF(MXLAY) *
4800! * *
4801! * Description: *
4802! * NG(IBAND) - number of g-values in band IBAND *
4803! * NSPA(IBAND) - for the lower atmosphere, the number of reference *
4804! * atmospheres that are stored for band IBAND per *
4805! * pressure level and temperature. Each of these *
4806! * atmospheres has different relative amounts of the *
4807! * key species for the band (i.e. different binary *
4808! * species parameters). *
4809! * NSPB(IBAND) - same for upper atmosphere *
4810! * ONEMINUS - since problems are caused in some cases by interpolation *
4811! * parameters equal to or greater than 1, for these cases *
4812! * these parameters are set to this value, slightly < 1. *
4813! * PAVEL - layer pressures (mb) *
4814! * TAVEL - layer temperatures (degrees K) *
4815! * PZ - level pressures (mb) *
4816! * TZ - level temperatures (degrees K) *
4817! * LAYTROP - layer at which switch is made from one combination of *
4818! * key species to another *
4819! * COLH2O, COLCO2, COLO3, COLN2O, COLCH4 - column amounts of water *
4820! * vapor,carbon dioxide, ozone, nitrous ozide, methane, *
4821! * respectively (molecules/cm**2) *
4822! * FACij(LAY) - for layer LAY, these are factors that are needed to *
4823! * compute the interpolation factors that multiply the *
4824! * appropriate reference k-values. A value of 0 (1) for *
4825! * i,j indicates that the corresponding factor multiplies *
4826! * reference k-value for the lower (higher) of the two *
4827! * appropriate temperatures, and altitudes, respectively. *
4828! * JP - the index of the lower (in altitude) of the two appropriate *
4829! * reference pressure levels needed for interpolation *
4830! * JT, JT1 - the indices of the lower of the two appropriate reference *
4831! * temperatures needed for interpolation (for pressure *
4832! * levels JP and JP+1, respectively) *
4833! * SELFFAC - scale factor needed for water vapor self-continuum, equals *
4834! * (water vapor density)/(atmospheric density at 296K and *
4835! * 1013 mb) *
4836! * SELFFRAC - factor needed for temperature interpolation of reference *
4837! * water vapor self-continuum data *
4838! * INDSELF - index of the lower of the two appropriate reference *
4839! * temperatures needed for the self-continuum interpolation *
4840! * FORFAC - scale factor needed for water vapor foreign-continuum. *
4841! * FORFRAC - factor needed for temperature interpolation of reference *
4842! * water vapor foreign-continuum data *
4843! * INDFOR - index of the lower of the two appropriate reference *
4844! * temperatures needed for the foreign-continuum interpolation *
4845! * *
4846! * Data input *
4847! * COMMON /Kn/ KA(NSPA(n),5,13,MG), KB(NSPB(n),5,13:59,MG), SELFREF(10,MG),*
4848! * FORREF(4,MG), KA_M'MGAS', KB_M'MGAS' *
4849! * (note: n is the band number,'MGAS' is the species name of the minor *
4850! * gas) *
4851! * *
4852! * Description: *
4853! * KA - k-values for low reference atmospheres (key-species only) *
4854! * (units: cm**2/molecule) *
4855! * KB - k-values for high reference atmospheres (key-species only) *
4856! * (units: cm**2/molecule) *
4857! * KA_M'MGAS' - k-values for low reference atmosphere minor species *
4858! * (units: cm**2/molecule) *
4859! * KB_M'MGAS' - k-values for high reference atmosphere minor species *
4860! * (units: cm**2/molecule) *
4861! * SELFREF - k-values for water vapor self-continuum for reference *
4862! * atmospheres (used below LAYTROP) *
4863! * (units: cm**2/molecule) *
4864! * FORREF - k-values for water vapor foreign-continuum for reference *
4865! * atmospheres (used below/above LAYTROP) *
4866! * (units: cm**2/molecule) *
4867! * *
4868! * DIMENSION ABSA(65*NSPA(n),MG), ABSB(235*NSPB(n),MG) *
4869! * EQUIVALENCE (KA,ABSA),(KB,ABSB) *
4870! * *
4871!*******************************************************************************
4872
4873! ------- Declarations -------
4874
4875! ----- Input -----
4876 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: nlayers ! total number of layers
4877 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: pavel(:) ! layer pressures (mb)
4878 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4879 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: wx(:,:) ! cross-section amounts (mol/cm2)
4880 ! Dimensions: (maxxsec,nlayers)
4881 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: coldry(:) ! column amount (dry air)
4882 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4883
4884 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: laytrop ! tropopause layer index
4885 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: jp(:) !
4886 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4887 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: jt(:) !
4888 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4889 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: jt1(:) !
4890 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4891 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: planklay(:,:) !
4892 ! Dimensions: (nlayers,nbndlw)
4893 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: planklev(0:,:) !
4894 ! Dimensions: (nlayers,nbndlw)
4895 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: plankbnd(:) !
4896 ! Dimensions: (nbndlw)
4897
4898 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: colh2o(:) ! column amount (h2o)
4899 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4900 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: colco2(:) ! column amount (co2)
4901 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4902 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: colo3(:) ! column amount (o3)
4903 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4904 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: coln2o(:) ! column amount (n2o)
4905 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4906 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: colco(:) ! column amount (co)
4907 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4908 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: colch4(:) ! column amount (ch4)
4909 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4910 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: colo2(:) ! column amount (o2)
4911 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4912 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: colbrd(:) ! column amount (broadening gases)
4913 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4914
4915 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: indself(:)
4916 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4917 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: indfor(:)
4918 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4919 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: selffac(:)
4920 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4921 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: selffrac(:)
4922 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4923 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: forfac(:)
4924 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4925 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: forfrac(:)
4926 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4927
4928 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: indminor(:)
4929 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4930 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: minorfrac(:)
4931 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4932 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: scaleminor(:)
4933 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4934 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: scaleminorn2(:)
4935 ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4936
4937 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: & !
4938 fac00(:), fac01(:), & ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4939 fac10(:), fac11(:)
4940 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: & !
4941 rat_h2oco2(:),rat_h2oco2_1(:), &
4942 rat_h2oo3(:),rat_h2oo3_1(:), & ! Dimensions: (nlayers)
4943 rat_h2on2o(:),rat_h2on2o_1(:), &
4944 rat_h2och4(:),rat_h2och4_1(:), &
4945 rat_n2oco2(:),rat_n2oco2_1(:), &
4946 rat_o3co2(:),rat_o3co2_1(:)
4947
4948! ----- Output -----
4949 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: fracs(:,:) ! planck fractions
4950 ! Dimensions: (nlayers+1,ngptlw)
4951 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: taug(:,:) ! gaseous optical depth
4952 ! Dimensions: (nlayers+1,ngptlw)
4953
4954!jm not thread safe hvrtau = '$Revision: 1.7 $'
4955
4956! Calculate gaseous optical depth and planck fractions for each spectral band.
4957
4958 call taugb1
4959 call taugb2
4960 call taugb3
4961 call taugb4
4962 call taugb5
4963 call taugb6
4964 call taugb7
4965 call taugb8
4966 call taugb9
4967 call taugb10
4968 call taugb11
4969 call taugb12
4970 call taugb13
4971 call taugb14
4972 call taugb15
4973 call taugb16
4974
4975 contains
4976
4977!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4978 subroutine taugb1
4979!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4980
4981! ------- Modifications -------
4982! Written by Eli J. Mlawer, Atmospheric & Environmental Research.
4983! Revised by Michael J. Iacono, Atmospheric & Environmental Research.
4984!
4985! band 1: 10-350 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - n2)
4986! (high key - h2o; high minor - n2)
4987!
4988! note: previous versions of rrtm band 1:
4989! 10-250 cm-1 (low - h2o; high - h2o)
4990!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4991
4992! ------- Modules -------
4993
4994 use parrrtm, only : ng1
4995 use rrlw_kg01, only : fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, &
4996 ka_mn2, kb_mn2, selfref, forref
4997
4998! ------- Declarations -------
4999
5000! Local
5001 integer(kind=im) :: lay, ind0, ind1, inds, indf, indm, ig
5002 real(kind=rb) :: pp, corradj, scalen2, tauself, taufor, taun2
5003
5004
5005! Minor gas mapping levels:
5006! lower - n2, p = 142.5490 mbar, t = 215.70 k
5007! upper - n2, p = 142.5490 mbar, t = 215.70 k
5008
5009! Compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure) and
5010! temperature. Below laytrop, the water vapor self-continuum and
5011! foreign continuum is interpolated (in temperature) separately.
5012
5013! Lower atmosphere loop
5014 do lay = 1, laytrop
5015
5016 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-1)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspa(1) + 1
5017 ind1 = (jp(lay)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspa(1) + 1
5018 inds = indself(lay)
5019 indf = indfor(lay)
5020 indm = indminor(lay)
5021 pp = pavel(lay)
5022 corradj = 1.
5023 if (pp .lt. 250._rb) then
5024 corradj = 1._rb - 0.15_rb * (250._rb-pp) / 154.4_rb
5025 endif
5026
5027 scalen2 = colbrd(lay) * scaleminorn2(lay)
5028 do ig = 1, ng1
5029 tauself = selffac(lay) * (selfref(inds,ig) + selffrac(lay) * &
5030 (selfref(inds+1,ig) - selfref(inds,ig)))
5031 taufor = forfac(lay) * (forref(indf,ig) + forfrac(lay) * &
5032 (forref(indf+1,ig) - forref(indf,ig)))
5033 taun2 = scalen2*(ka_mn2(indm,ig) + &
5034 minorfrac(lay) * (ka_mn2(indm+1,ig) - ka_mn2(indm,ig)))
5035 taug(lay,ig) = corradj * (colh2o(lay) * &
5036 (fac00(lay) * absa(ind0,ig) + &
5037 fac10(lay) * absa(ind0+1,ig) + &
5038 fac01(lay) * absa(ind1,ig) + &
5039 fac11(lay) * absa(ind1+1,ig)) &
5040 + tauself + taufor + taun2)
5041 fracs(lay,ig) = fracrefa(ig)
5042 enddo
5043 enddo
5044
5045! Upper atmosphere loop
5046 do lay = laytrop+1, nlayers
5047
5048 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-13)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspb(1) + 1
5049 ind1 = ((jp(lay)-12)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspb(1) + 1
5050 indf = indfor(lay)
5051 indm = indminor(lay)
5052 pp = pavel(lay)
5053 corradj = 1._rb - 0.15_rb * (pp / 95.6_rb)
5054
5055 scalen2 = colbrd(lay) * scaleminorn2(lay)
5056 do ig = 1, ng1
5057 taufor = forfac(lay) * (forref(indf,ig) + &
5058 forfrac(lay) * (forref(indf+1,ig) - forref(indf,ig)))
5059 taun2 = scalen2*(kb_mn2(indm,ig) + &
5060 minorfrac(lay) * (kb_mn2(indm+1,ig) - kb_mn2(indm,ig)))
5061 taug(lay,ig) = corradj * (colh2o(lay) * &
5062 (fac00(lay) * absb(ind0,ig) + &
5063 fac10(lay) * absb(ind0+1,ig) + &
5064 fac01(lay) * absb(ind1,ig) + &
5065 fac11(lay) * absb(ind1+1,ig)) &
5066 + taufor + taun2)
5067 fracs(lay,ig) = fracrefb(ig)
5068 enddo
5069 enddo
5070
5071 end subroutine taugb1
5072
5073!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5074 subroutine taugb2
5075!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5076!
5077! band 2: 350-500 cm-1 (low key - h2o; high key - h2o)
5078!
5079! note: previous version of rrtm band 2:
5080! 250 - 500 cm-1 (low - h2o; high - h2o)
5081!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5082
5083! ------- Modules -------
5084
5085 use parrrtm, only : ng2, ngs1
5086 use rrlw_kg02, only : fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, &
5087 selfref, forref
5088
5089! ------- Declarations -------
5090
5091! Local
5092 integer(kind=im) :: lay, ind0, ind1, inds, indf, ig
5093 real(kind=rb) :: pp, corradj, tauself, taufor
5094
5095
5096! Compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure) and
5097! temperature. Below laytrop, the water vapor self-continuum and
5098! foreign continuum is interpolated (in temperature) separately.
5099
5100! Lower atmosphere loop
5101 do lay = 1, laytrop
5102
5103 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-1)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspa(2) + 1
5104 ind1 = (jp(lay)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspa(2) + 1
5105 inds = indself(lay)
5106 indf = indfor(lay)
5107 pp = pavel(lay)
5108 corradj = 1._rb - .05_rb * (pp - 100._rb) / 900._rb
5109 do ig = 1, ng2
5110 tauself = selffac(lay) * (selfref(inds,ig) + selffrac(lay) * &
5111 (selfref(inds+1,ig) - selfref(inds,ig)))
5112 taufor = forfac(lay) * (forref(indf,ig) + forfrac(lay) * &
5113 (forref(indf+1,ig) - forref(indf,ig)))
5114 taug(lay,ngs1+ig) = corradj * (colh2o(lay) * &
5115 (fac00(lay) * absa(ind0,ig) + &
5116 fac10(lay) * absa(ind0+1,ig) + &
5117 fac01(lay) * absa(ind1,ig) + &
5118 fac11(lay) * absa(ind1+1,ig)) &
5119 + tauself + taufor)
5120 fracs(lay,ngs1+ig) = fracrefa(ig)
5121 enddo
5122 enddo
5123
5124! Upper atmosphere loop
5125 do lay = laytrop+1, nlayers
5126
5127 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-13)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspb(2) + 1
5128 ind1 = ((jp(lay)-12)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspb(2) + 1
5129 indf = indfor(lay)
5130 do ig = 1, ng2
5131 taufor = forfac(lay) * (forref(indf,ig) + &
5132 forfrac(lay) * (forref(indf+1,ig) - forref(indf,ig)))
5133 taug(lay,ngs1+ig) = colh2o(lay) * &
5134 (fac00(lay) * absb(ind0,ig) + &
5135 fac10(lay) * absb(ind0+1,ig) + &
5136 fac01(lay) * absb(ind1,ig) + &
5137 fac11(lay) * absb(ind1+1,ig)) &
5138 + taufor
5139 fracs(lay,ngs1+ig) = fracrefb(ig)
5140 enddo
5141 enddo
5142
5143 end subroutine taugb2
5144
5145!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5146 subroutine taugb3
5147!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5148!
5149! band 3: 500-630 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; low minor - n2o)
5150! (high key - h2o,co2; high minor - n2o)
5151!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5152
5153! ------- Modules -------
5154
5155 use parrrtm, only : ng3, ngs2
5156 use rrlw_ref, only : chi_mls
5157 use rrlw_kg03, only : fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, &
5158 ka_mn2o, kb_mn2o, selfref, forref
5159
5160! ------- Declarations -------
5161
5162! Local
5163 integer(kind=im) :: lay, ind0, ind1, inds, indf, indm, ig
5164 integer(kind=im) :: js, js1, jmn2o, jpl
5165 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs
5166 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1
5167 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb_mn2o, specparm_mn2o, specmult_mn2o, &
5168 fmn2o, fmn2omf, chi_n2o, ratn2o, adjfac, adjcoln2o
5169 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb_planck, specparm_planck, specmult_planck, fpl
5170 real(kind=rb) :: p, p4, fk0, fk1, fk2
5171 real(kind=rb) :: fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210
5172 real(kind=rb) :: fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211
5173 real(kind=rb) :: tauself, taufor, n2om1, n2om2, absn2o
5174 real(kind=rb) :: refrat_planck_a, refrat_planck_b, refrat_m_a, refrat_m_b
5175 real(kind=rb) :: tau_major, tau_major1
5176
5177
5178! Minor gas mapping levels:
5179! lower - n2o, p = 706.272 mbar, t = 278.94 k
5180! upper - n2o, p = 95.58 mbar, t = 215.7 k
5181
5182! P = 212.725 mb
5183 refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,9)/chi_mls(2,9)
5184
5185! P = 95.58 mb
5186 refrat_planck_b = chi_mls(1,13)/chi_mls(2,13)
5187
5188! P = 706.270mb
5189 refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(2,3)
5190
5191! P = 95.58 mb
5192 refrat_m_b = chi_mls(1,13)/chi_mls(2,13)
5193
5194! Compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure) and
5195! temperature, and appropriate species. Below laytrop, the water vapor
5196! self-continuum and foreign continuum is interpolated (in temperature)
5197! separately.
5198
5199! Lower atmosphere loop
5200 do lay = 1, laytrop
5201
5202 speccomb = colh2o(lay) + rat_h2oco2(lay)*colco2(lay)
5203 specparm = colh2o(lay)/speccomb
5204 if (specparm .ge. oneminus) specparm = oneminus
5205 specmult = 8._rb*(specparm)
5206 js = 1 + int(specmult)
5207 fs = mod(specmult,1.0_rb)
5208
5209 speccomb1 = colh2o(lay) + rat_h2oco2_1(lay)*colco2(lay)
5210 specparm1 = colh2o(lay)/speccomb1
5211 if (specparm1 .ge. oneminus) specparm1 = oneminus
5212 specmult1 = 8._rb*(specparm1)
5213 js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
5214 fs1 = mod(specmult1,1.0_rb)
5215
5216 speccomb_mn2o = colh2o(lay) + refrat_m_a*colco2(lay)
5217 specparm_mn2o = colh2o(lay)/speccomb_mn2o
5218 if (specparm_mn2o .ge. oneminus) specparm_mn2o = oneminus
5219 specmult_mn2o = 8._rb*specparm_mn2o
5220 jmn2o = 1 + int(specmult_mn2o)
5221 fmn2o = mod(specmult_mn2o,1.0_rb)
5222 fmn2omf = minorfrac(lay)*fmn2o
5223! In atmospheres where the amount of N2O is too great to be considered
5224! a minor species, adjust the column amount of N2O by an empirical factor
5225! to obtain the proper contribution.
5226 chi_n2o = coln2o(lay)/coldry(lay)
5227 ratn2o = 1.e20_rb*chi_n2o/chi_mls(4,jp(lay)+1)
5228 if (ratn2o .gt. 1.5_rb) then
5229 adjfac = 0.5_rb+(ratn2o-0.5_rb)**0.65_rb
5230 adjcoln2o = adjfac*chi_mls(4,jp(lay)+1)*coldry(lay)*1.e-20_rb
5231 else
5232 adjcoln2o = coln2o(lay)
5233 endif
5234
5235 speccomb_planck = colh2o(lay)+refrat_planck_a*colco2(lay)
5236 specparm_planck = colh2o(lay)/speccomb_planck
5237 if (specparm_planck .ge. oneminus) specparm_planck=oneminus
5238 specmult_planck = 8._rb*specparm_planck
5239 jpl= 1 + int(specmult_planck)
5240 fpl = mod(specmult_planck,1.0_rb)
5241
5242 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-1)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspa(3) + js
5243 ind1 = (jp(lay)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspa(3) + js1
5244 inds = indself(lay)
5245 indf = indfor(lay)
5246 indm = indminor(lay)
5247
5248 if (specparm .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5249 p = fs - 1
5250 p4 = p**4
5251 fk0 = p4
5252 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5253 fk2 = p + p4
5254 fac000 = fk0*fac00(lay)
5255 fac100 = fk1*fac00(lay)
5256 fac200 = fk2*fac00(lay)
5257 fac010 = fk0*fac10(lay)
5258 fac110 = fk1*fac10(lay)
5259 fac210 = fk2*fac10(lay)
5260 else if (specparm .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5261 p = -fs
5262 p4 = p**4
5263 fk0 = p4
5264 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5265 fk2 = p + p4
5266 fac000 = fk0*fac00(lay)
5267 fac100 = fk1*fac00(lay)
5268 fac200 = fk2*fac00(lay)
5269 fac010 = fk0*fac10(lay)
5270 fac110 = fk1*fac10(lay)
5271 fac210 = fk2*fac10(lay)
5272 else
5273 fac000 = (1._rb - fs) * fac00(lay)
5274 fac010 = (1._rb - fs) * fac10(lay)
5275 fac100 = fs * fac00(lay)
5276 fac110 = fs * fac10(lay)
5277 endif
5278 if (specparm1 .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5279 p = fs1 - 1
5280 p4 = p**4
5281 fk0 = p4
5282 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5283 fk2 = p + p4
5284 fac001 = fk0*fac01(lay)
5285 fac101 = fk1*fac01(lay)
5286 fac201 = fk2*fac01(lay)
5287 fac011 = fk0*fac11(lay)
5288 fac111 = fk1*fac11(lay)
5289 fac211 = fk2*fac11(lay)
5290 else if (specparm1 .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5291 p = -fs1
5292 p4 = p**4
5293 fk0 = p4
5294 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5295 fk2 = p + p4
5296 fac001 = fk0*fac01(lay)
5297 fac101 = fk1*fac01(lay)
5298 fac201 = fk2*fac01(lay)
5299 fac011 = fk0*fac11(lay)
5300 fac111 = fk1*fac11(lay)
5301 fac211 = fk2*fac11(lay)
5302 else
5303 fac001 = (1._rb - fs1) * fac01(lay)
5304 fac011 = (1._rb - fs1) * fac11(lay)
5305 fac101 = fs1 * fac01(lay)
5306 fac111 = fs1 * fac11(lay)
5307 endif
5308
5309 do ig = 1, ng3
5310 tauself = selffac(lay)* (selfref(inds,ig) + selffrac(lay) * &
5311 (selfref(inds+1,ig) - selfref(inds,ig)))
5312 taufor = forfac(lay) * (forref(indf,ig) + forfrac(lay) * &
5313 (forref(indf+1,ig) - forref(indf,ig)))
5314 n2om1 = ka_mn2o(jmn2o,indm,ig) + fmn2o * &
5315 (ka_mn2o(jmn2o+1,indm,ig) - ka_mn2o(jmn2o,indm,ig))
5316 n2om2 = ka_mn2o(jmn2o,indm+1,ig) + fmn2o * &
5317 (ka_mn2o(jmn2o+1,indm+1,ig) - ka_mn2o(jmn2o,indm+1,ig))
5318 absn2o = n2om1 + minorfrac(lay) * (n2om2 - n2om1)
5319
5320 if (specparm .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5321 tau_major = speccomb * &
5322 (fac000 * absa(ind0,ig) + &
5323 fac100 * absa(ind0+1,ig) + &
5324 fac200 * absa(ind0+2,ig) + &
5325 fac010 * absa(ind0+9,ig) + &
5326 fac110 * absa(ind0+10,ig) + &
5327 fac210 * absa(ind0+11,ig))
5328 else if (specparm .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5329 tau_major = speccomb * &
5330 (fac200 * absa(ind0-1,ig) + &
5331 fac100 * absa(ind0,ig) + &
5332 fac000 * absa(ind0+1,ig) + &
5333 fac210 * absa(ind0+8,ig) + &
5334 fac110 * absa(ind0+9,ig) + &
5335 fac010 * absa(ind0+10,ig))
5336 else
5337 tau_major = speccomb * &
5338 (fac000 * absa(ind0,ig) + &
5339 fac100 * absa(ind0+1,ig) + &
5340 fac010 * absa(ind0+9,ig) + &
5341 fac110 * absa(ind0+10,ig))
5342 endif
5343
5344 if (specparm1 .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5345 tau_major1 = speccomb1 * &
5346 (fac001 * absa(ind1,ig) + &
5347 fac101 * absa(ind1+1,ig) + &
5348 fac201 * absa(ind1+2,ig) + &
5349 fac011 * absa(ind1+9,ig) + &
5350 fac111 * absa(ind1+10,ig) + &
5351 fac211 * absa(ind1+11,ig))
5352 else if (specparm1 .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5353 tau_major1 = speccomb1 * &
5354 (fac201 * absa(ind1-1,ig) + &
5355 fac101 * absa(ind1,ig) + &
5356 fac001 * absa(ind1+1,ig) + &
5357 fac211 * absa(ind1+8,ig) + &
5358 fac111 * absa(ind1+9,ig) + &
5359 fac011 * absa(ind1+10,ig))
5360 else
5361 tau_major1 = speccomb1 * &
5362 (fac001 * absa(ind1,ig) + &
5363 fac101 * absa(ind1+1,ig) + &
5364 fac011 * absa(ind1+9,ig) + &
5365 fac111 * absa(ind1+10,ig))
5366 endif
5367
5368 taug(lay,ngs2+ig) = tau_major + tau_major1 &
5369 + tauself + taufor &
5370 + adjcoln2o*absn2o
5371 fracs(lay,ngs2+ig) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl * &
5372 (fracrefa(ig,jpl+1)-fracrefa(ig,jpl))
5373 enddo
5374 enddo
5375
5376! Upper atmosphere loop
5377 do lay = laytrop+1, nlayers
5378
5379 speccomb = colh2o(lay) + rat_h2oco2(lay)*colco2(lay)
5380 specparm = colh2o(lay)/speccomb
5381 if (specparm .ge. oneminus) specparm = oneminus
5382 specmult = 4._rb*(specparm)
5383 js = 1 + int(specmult)
5384 fs = mod(specmult,1.0_rb)
5385
5386 speccomb1 = colh2o(lay) + rat_h2oco2_1(lay)*colco2(lay)
5387 specparm1 = colh2o(lay)/speccomb1
5388 if (specparm1 .ge. oneminus) specparm1 = oneminus
5389 specmult1 = 4._rb*(specparm1)
5390 js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
5391 fs1 = mod(specmult1,1.0_rb)
5392
5393 fac000 = (1._rb - fs) * fac00(lay)
5394 fac010 = (1._rb - fs) * fac10(lay)
5395 fac100 = fs * fac00(lay)
5396 fac110 = fs * fac10(lay)
5397 fac001 = (1._rb - fs1) * fac01(lay)
5398 fac011 = (1._rb - fs1) * fac11(lay)
5399 fac101 = fs1 * fac01(lay)
5400 fac111 = fs1 * fac11(lay)
5401
5402 speccomb_mn2o = colh2o(lay) + refrat_m_b*colco2(lay)
5403 specparm_mn2o = colh2o(lay)/speccomb_mn2o
5404 if (specparm_mn2o .ge. oneminus) specparm_mn2o = oneminus
5405 specmult_mn2o = 4._rb*specparm_mn2o
5406 jmn2o = 1 + int(specmult_mn2o)
5407 fmn2o = mod(specmult_mn2o,1.0_rb)
5408 fmn2omf = minorfrac(lay)*fmn2o
5409! In atmospheres where the amount of N2O is too great to be considered
5410! a minor species, adjust the column amount of N2O by an empirical factor
5411! to obtain the proper contribution.
5412 chi_n2o = coln2o(lay)/coldry(lay)
5413 ratn2o = 1.e20*chi_n2o/chi_mls(4,jp(lay)+1)
5414 if (ratn2o .gt. 1.5_rb) then
5415 adjfac = 0.5_rb+(ratn2o-0.5_rb)**0.65_rb
5416 adjcoln2o = adjfac*chi_mls(4,jp(lay)+1)*coldry(lay)*1.e-20_rb
5417 else
5418 adjcoln2o = coln2o(lay)
5419 endif
5420
5421 speccomb_planck = colh2o(lay)+refrat_planck_b*colco2(lay)
5422 specparm_planck = colh2o(lay)/speccomb_planck
5423 if (specparm_planck .ge. oneminus) specparm_planck=oneminus
5424 specmult_planck = 4._rb*specparm_planck
5425 jpl= 1 + int(specmult_planck)
5426 fpl = mod(specmult_planck,1.0_rb)
5427
5428 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-13)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspb(3) + js
5429 ind1 = ((jp(lay)-12)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspb(3) + js1
5430 indf = indfor(lay)
5431 indm = indminor(lay)
5432
5433 do ig = 1, ng3
5434 taufor = forfac(lay) * (forref(indf,ig) + &
5435 forfrac(lay) * (forref(indf+1,ig) - forref(indf,ig)))
5436 n2om1 = kb_mn2o(jmn2o,indm,ig) + fmn2o * &
5437 (kb_mn2o(jmn2o+1,indm,ig)-kb_mn2o(jmn2o,indm,ig))
5438 n2om2 = kb_mn2o(jmn2o,indm+1,ig) + fmn2o * &
5439 (kb_mn2o(jmn2o+1,indm+1,ig)-kb_mn2o(jmn2o,indm+1,ig))
5440 absn2o = n2om1 + minorfrac(lay) * (n2om2 - n2om1)
5441 taug(lay,ngs2+ig) = speccomb * &
5442 (fac000 * absb(ind0,ig) + &
5443 fac100 * absb(ind0+1,ig) + &
5444 fac010 * absb(ind0+5,ig) + &
5445 fac110 * absb(ind0+6,ig)) &
5446 + speccomb1 * &
5447 (fac001 * absb(ind1,ig) + &
5448 fac101 * absb(ind1+1,ig) + &
5449 fac011 * absb(ind1+5,ig) + &
5450 fac111 * absb(ind1+6,ig)) &
5451 + taufor &
5452 + adjcoln2o*absn2o
5453 fracs(lay,ngs2+ig) = fracrefb(ig,jpl) + fpl * &
5454 (fracrefb(ig,jpl+1)-fracrefb(ig,jpl))
5455 enddo
5456 enddo
5457
5458 end subroutine taugb3
5459
5460!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5461 subroutine taugb4
5462!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5463!
5464! band 4: 630-700 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; high key - o3,co2)
5465!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5466
5467! ------- Modules -------
5468
5469 use parrrtm, only : ng4, ngs3
5470 use rrlw_ref, only : chi_mls
5471 use rrlw_kg04, only : fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, &
5472 selfref, forref
5473
5474! ------- Declarations -------
5475
5476! Local
5477 integer(kind=im) :: lay, ind0, ind1, inds, indf, ig
5478 integer(kind=im) :: js, js1, jpl
5479 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs
5480 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1
5481 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb_planck, specparm_planck, specmult_planck, fpl
5482 real(kind=rb) :: p, p4, fk0, fk1, fk2
5483 real(kind=rb) :: fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210
5484 real(kind=rb) :: fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211
5485 real(kind=rb) :: tauself, taufor
5486 real(kind=rb) :: refrat_planck_a, refrat_planck_b
5487 real(kind=rb) :: tau_major, tau_major1
5488
5489
5490! P = 142.5940 mb
5491 refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,11)/chi_mls(2,11)
5492
5493! P = 95.58350 mb
5494 refrat_planck_b = chi_mls(3,13)/chi_mls(2,13)
5495
5496! Compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure) and
5497! temperature, and appropriate species. Below laytrop, the water
5498! vapor self-continuum and foreign continuum is interpolated (in temperature)
5499! separately.
5500
5501! Lower atmosphere loop
5502 do lay = 1, laytrop
5503
5504 speccomb = colh2o(lay) + rat_h2oco2(lay)*colco2(lay)
5505 specparm = colh2o(lay)/speccomb
5506 if (specparm .ge. oneminus) specparm = oneminus
5507 specmult = 8._rb*(specparm)
5508 js = 1 + int(specmult)
5509 fs = mod(specmult,1.0_rb)
5510
5511 speccomb1 = colh2o(lay) + rat_h2oco2_1(lay)*colco2(lay)
5512 specparm1 = colh2o(lay)/speccomb1
5513 if (specparm1 .ge. oneminus) specparm1 = oneminus
5514 specmult1 = 8._rb*(specparm1)
5515 js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
5516 fs1 = mod(specmult1,1.0_rb)
5517
5518 speccomb_planck = colh2o(lay)+refrat_planck_a*colco2(lay)
5519 specparm_planck = colh2o(lay)/speccomb_planck
5520 if (specparm_planck .ge. oneminus) specparm_planck=oneminus
5521 specmult_planck = 8._rb*specparm_planck
5522 jpl= 1 + int(specmult_planck)
5523 fpl = mod(specmult_planck,1.0_rb)
5524
5525 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-1)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspa(4) + js
5526 ind1 = (jp(lay)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspa(4) + js1
5527 inds = indself(lay)
5528 indf = indfor(lay)
5529
5530 if (specparm .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5531 p = fs - 1
5532 p4 = p**4
5533 fk0 = p4
5534 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5535 fk2 = p + p4
5536 fac000 = fk0*fac00(lay)
5537 fac100 = fk1*fac00(lay)
5538 fac200 = fk2*fac00(lay)
5539 fac010 = fk0*fac10(lay)
5540 fac110 = fk1*fac10(lay)
5541 fac210 = fk2*fac10(lay)
5542 else if (specparm .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5543 p = -fs
5544 p4 = p**4
5545 fk0 = p4
5546 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5547 fk2 = p + p4
5548 fac000 = fk0*fac00(lay)
5549 fac100 = fk1*fac00(lay)
5550 fac200 = fk2*fac00(lay)
5551 fac010 = fk0*fac10(lay)
5552 fac110 = fk1*fac10(lay)
5553 fac210 = fk2*fac10(lay)
5554 else
5555 fac000 = (1._rb - fs) * fac00(lay)
5556 fac010 = (1._rb - fs) * fac10(lay)
5557 fac100 = fs * fac00(lay)
5558 fac110 = fs * fac10(lay)
5559 endif
5560
5561 if (specparm1 .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5562 p = fs1 - 1
5563 p4 = p**4
5564 fk0 = p4
5565 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5566 fk2 = p + p4
5567 fac001 = fk0*fac01(lay)
5568 fac101 = fk1*fac01(lay)
5569 fac201 = fk2*fac01(lay)
5570 fac011 = fk0*fac11(lay)
5571 fac111 = fk1*fac11(lay)
5572 fac211 = fk2*fac11(lay)
5573 else if (specparm1 .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5574 p = -fs1
5575 p4 = p**4
5576 fk0 = p4
5577 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5578 fk2 = p + p4
5579 fac001 = fk0*fac01(lay)
5580 fac101 = fk1*fac01(lay)
5581 fac201 = fk2*fac01(lay)
5582 fac011 = fk0*fac11(lay)
5583 fac111 = fk1*fac11(lay)
5584 fac211 = fk2*fac11(lay)
5585 else
5586 fac001 = (1._rb - fs1) * fac01(lay)
5587 fac011 = (1._rb - fs1) * fac11(lay)
5588 fac101 = fs1 * fac01(lay)
5589 fac111 = fs1 * fac11(lay)
5590 endif
5591
5592 do ig = 1, ng4
5593 tauself = selffac(lay)* (selfref(inds,ig) + selffrac(lay) * &
5594 (selfref(inds+1,ig) - selfref(inds,ig)))
5595 taufor = forfac(lay) * (forref(indf,ig) + forfrac(lay) * &
5596 (forref(indf+1,ig) - forref(indf,ig)))
5597
5598 if (specparm .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5599 tau_major = speccomb * &
5600 (fac000 * absa(ind0,ig) + &
5601 fac100 * absa(ind0+1,ig) + &
5602 fac200 * absa(ind0+2,ig) + &
5603 fac010 * absa(ind0+9,ig) + &
5604 fac110 * absa(ind0+10,ig) + &
5605 fac210 * absa(ind0+11,ig))
5606 else if (specparm .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5607 tau_major = speccomb * &
5608 (fac200 * absa(ind0-1,ig) + &
5609 fac100 * absa(ind0,ig) + &
5610 fac000 * absa(ind0+1,ig) + &
5611 fac210 * absa(ind0+8,ig) + &
5612 fac110 * absa(ind0+9,ig) + &
5613 fac010 * absa(ind0+10,ig))
5614 else
5615 tau_major = speccomb * &
5616 (fac000 * absa(ind0,ig) + &
5617 fac100 * absa(ind0+1,ig) + &
5618 fac010 * absa(ind0+9,ig) + &
5619 fac110 * absa(ind0+10,ig))
5620 endif
5621
5622 if (specparm1 .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5623 tau_major1 = speccomb1 * &
5624 (fac001 * absa(ind1,ig) + &
5625 fac101 * absa(ind1+1,ig) + &
5626 fac201 * absa(ind1+2,ig) + &
5627 fac011 * absa(ind1+9,ig) + &
5628 fac111 * absa(ind1+10,ig) + &
5629 fac211 * absa(ind1+11,ig))
5630 else if (specparm1 .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5631 tau_major1 = speccomb1 * &
5632 (fac201 * absa(ind1-1,ig) + &
5633 fac101 * absa(ind1,ig) + &
5634 fac001 * absa(ind1+1,ig) + &
5635 fac211 * absa(ind1+8,ig) + &
5636 fac111 * absa(ind1+9,ig) + &
5637 fac011 * absa(ind1+10,ig))
5638 else
5639 tau_major1 = speccomb1 * &
5640 (fac001 * absa(ind1,ig) + &
5641 fac101 * absa(ind1+1,ig) + &
5642 fac011 * absa(ind1+9,ig) + &
5643 fac111 * absa(ind1+10,ig))
5644 endif
5645
5646 taug(lay,ngs3+ig) = tau_major + tau_major1 &
5647 + tauself + taufor
5648 fracs(lay,ngs3+ig) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl * &
5649 (fracrefa(ig,jpl+1)-fracrefa(ig,jpl))
5650 enddo
5651 enddo
5652
5653! Upper atmosphere loop
5654 do lay = laytrop+1, nlayers
5655
5656 speccomb = colo3(lay) + rat_o3co2(lay)*colco2(lay)
5657 specparm = colo3(lay)/speccomb
5658 if (specparm .ge. oneminus) specparm = oneminus
5659 specmult = 4._rb*(specparm)
5660 js = 1 + int(specmult)
5661 fs = mod(specmult,1.0_rb)
5662
5663 speccomb1 = colo3(lay) + rat_o3co2_1(lay)*colco2(lay)
5664 specparm1 = colo3(lay)/speccomb1
5665 if (specparm1 .ge. oneminus) specparm1 = oneminus
5666 specmult1 = 4._rb*(specparm1)
5667 js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
5668 fs1 = mod(specmult1,1.0_rb)
5669
5670 fac000 = (1._rb - fs) * fac00(lay)
5671 fac010 = (1._rb - fs) * fac10(lay)
5672 fac100 = fs * fac00(lay)
5673 fac110 = fs * fac10(lay)
5674 fac001 = (1._rb - fs1) * fac01(lay)
5675 fac011 = (1._rb - fs1) * fac11(lay)
5676 fac101 = fs1 * fac01(lay)
5677 fac111 = fs1 * fac11(lay)
5678
5679 speccomb_planck = colo3(lay)+refrat_planck_b*colco2(lay)
5680 specparm_planck = colo3(lay)/speccomb_planck
5681 if (specparm_planck .ge. oneminus) specparm_planck=oneminus
5682 specmult_planck = 4._rb*specparm_planck
5683 jpl= 1 + int(specmult_planck)
5684 fpl = mod(specmult_planck,1.0_rb)
5685
5686 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-13)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspb(4) + js
5687 ind1 = ((jp(lay)-12)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspb(4) + js1
5688
5689 do ig = 1, ng4
5690 taug(lay,ngs3+ig) = speccomb * &
5691 (fac000 * absb(ind0,ig) + &
5692 fac100 * absb(ind0+1,ig) + &
5693 fac010 * absb(ind0+5,ig) + &
5694 fac110 * absb(ind0+6,ig)) &
5695 + speccomb1 * &
5696 (fac001 * absb(ind1,ig) + &
5697 fac101 * absb(ind1+1,ig) + &
5698 fac011 * absb(ind1+5,ig) + &
5699 fac111 * absb(ind1+6,ig))
5700 fracs(lay,ngs3+ig) = fracrefb(ig,jpl) + fpl * &
5701 (fracrefb(ig,jpl+1)-fracrefb(ig,jpl))
5702 enddo
5703
5704! Empirical modification to code to improve stratospheric cooling rates
5705! for co2. Revised to apply weighting for g-point reduction in this band.
5706
5707 taug(lay,ngs3+8)=taug(lay,ngs3+8)*0.92
5708 taug(lay,ngs3+9)=taug(lay,ngs3+9)*0.88
5709 taug(lay,ngs3+10)=taug(lay,ngs3+10)*1.07
5710 taug(lay,ngs3+11)=taug(lay,ngs3+11)*1.1
5711 taug(lay,ngs3+12)=taug(lay,ngs3+12)*0.99
5712 taug(lay,ngs3+13)=taug(lay,ngs3+13)*0.88
5713 taug(lay,ngs3+14)=taug(lay,ngs3+14)*0.943
5714
5715 enddo
5716
5717 end subroutine taugb4
5718
5719!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5720 subroutine taugb5
5721!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5722!
5723! band 5: 700-820 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; low minor - o3, ccl4)
5724! (high key - o3,co2)
5725!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
5726
5727! ------- Modules -------
5728
5729 use parrrtm, only : ng5, ngs4
5730 use rrlw_ref, only : chi_mls
5731 use rrlw_kg05, only : fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, &
5732 ka_mo3, selfref, forref, ccl4
5733
5734! ------- Declarations -------
5735
5736! Local
5737 integer(kind=im) :: lay, ind0, ind1, inds, indf, indm, ig
5738 integer(kind=im) :: js, js1, jmo3, jpl
5739 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs
5740 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1
5741 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb_mo3, specparm_mo3, specmult_mo3, fmo3
5742 real(kind=rb) :: speccomb_planck, specparm_planck, specmult_planck, fpl
5743 real(kind=rb) :: p, p4, fk0, fk1, fk2
5744 real(kind=rb) :: fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210
5745 real(kind=rb) :: fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211
5746 real(kind=rb) :: tauself, taufor, o3m1, o3m2, abso3
5747 real(kind=rb) :: refrat_planck_a, refrat_planck_b, refrat_m_a
5748 real(kind=rb) :: tau_major, tau_major1
5749
5750
5751! Minor gas mapping level :
5752! lower - o3, p = 317.34 mbar, t = 240.77 k
5753! lower - ccl4
5754
5755! Calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck
5756! fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.
5757
5758! P = 473.420 mb
5759 refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,5)/chi_mls(2,5)
5760
5761! P = 0.2369 mb
5762 refrat_planck_b = chi_mls(3,43)/chi_mls(2,43)
5763
5764! P = 317.3480
5765 refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,7)/chi_mls(2,7)
5766
5767! Compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure) and
5768! temperature, and appropriate species. Below laytrop, the
5769! water vapor self-continuum and foreign continuum is
5770! interpolated (in temperature) separately.
5771
5772! Lower atmosphere loop
5773 do lay = 1, laytrop
5774
5775 speccomb = colh2o(lay) + rat_h2oco2(lay)*colco2(lay)
5776 specparm = colh2o(lay)/speccomb
5777 if (specparm .ge. oneminus) specparm = oneminus
5778 specmult = 8._rb*(specparm)
5779 js = 1 + int(specmult)
5780 fs = mod(specmult,1.0_rb)
5781
5782 speccomb1 = colh2o(lay) + rat_h2oco2_1(lay)*colco2(lay)
5783 specparm1 = colh2o(lay)/speccomb1
5784 if (specparm1 .ge. oneminus) specparm1 = oneminus
5785 specmult1 = 8._rb*(specparm1)
5786 js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
5787 fs1 = mod(specmult1,1.0_rb)
5788
5789 speccomb_mo3 = colh2o(lay) + refrat_m_a*colco2(lay)
5790 specparm_mo3 = colh2o(lay)/speccomb_mo3
5791 if (specparm_mo3 .ge. oneminus) specparm_mo3 = oneminus
5792 specmult_mo3 = 8._rb*specparm_mo3
5793 jmo3 = 1 + int(specmult_mo3)
5794 fmo3 = mod(specmult_mo3,1.0_rb)
5795
5796 speccomb_planck = colh2o(lay)+refrat_planck_a*colco2(lay)
5797 specparm_planck = colh2o(lay)/speccomb_planck
5798 if (specparm_planck .ge. oneminus) specparm_planck=oneminus
5799 specmult_planck = 8._rb*specparm_planck
5800 jpl= 1 + int(specmult_planck)
5801 fpl = mod(specmult_planck,1.0_rb)
5802
5803 ind0 = ((jp(lay)-1)*5+(jt(lay)-1))*nspa(5) + js
5804 ind1 = (jp(lay)*5+(jt1(lay)-1))*nspa(5) + js1
5805 inds = indself(lay)
5806 indf = indfor(lay)
5807 indm = indminor(lay)
5808
5809 if (specparm .lt. 0.125_rb) then
5810 p = fs - 1
5811 p4 = p**4
5812 fk0 = p4
5813 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5814 fk2 = p + p4
5815 fac000 = fk0*fac00(lay)
5816 fac100 = fk1*fac00(lay)
5817 fac200 = fk2*fac00(lay)
5818 fac010 = fk0*fac10(lay)
5819 fac110 = fk1*fac10(lay)
5820 fac210 = fk2*fac10(lay)
5821 else if (specparm .gt. 0.875_rb) then
5822 p = -fs
5823 p4 = p**4
5824 fk0 = p4
5825 fk1 = 1 - p - 2.0_rb*p4
5826 fk2 = p + p4
5827 fac000 = fk0*fac00(lay)
5828 fac100 = fk1*fac00(lay)
5829 fac200 = fk2*fac00(lay)
5830 fac010 = fk0*fac10(lay)
5831 fac110 = fk1*fac10(lay)
