8210 14,14, & ! band 14
8211 15,15, & ! band 15
8212 16,16/) ! band 16
8213 wt(:) = (/ 0.1527534276_rb, 0.1491729617_rb, 0.1420961469_rb, &
8214 0.1316886544_rb, 0.1181945205_rb, 0.1019300893_rb, &
8215 0.0832767040_rb, 0.0626720116_rb, 0.0424925000_rb, &
8216 0.0046269894_rb, 0.0038279891_rb, 0.0030260086_rb, &
8217 0.0022199750_rb, 0.0014140010_rb, 0.0005330000_rb, &
8218 0.0000750000_rb/)
8219
8220 end subroutine lwcmbdat
8221
8222!***************************************************************************
8223 subroutine cmbgb1
8224!***************************************************************************
8225!
8226! Original version: MJIacono; July 1998
8227! Revision for GCMs: MJIacono; September 1998
8228! Revision for RRTMG: MJIacono, September 2002
8229! Revision for F90 reformatting: MJIacono, June 2006
8230!
8231! The subroutines CMBGB1->CMBGB16 input the absorption coefficient
8232! data for each band, which are defined for 16 g-points and 16 spectral
8233! bands. The data are combined with appropriate weighting following the
8234! g-point mapping arrays specified in RRTMINIT. Plank fraction data
8235! in arrays FRACREFA and FRACREFB are combined without weighting. All
8236! g-point reduced data are put into new arrays for use in RRTM.
8237!
8238! band 1: 10-350 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - n2)
8239! (high key - h2o; high minor - n2)
8240! note: previous versions of rrtm band 1:
8241! 10-250 cm-1 (low - h2o; high - h2o)
8242!***************************************************************************
8243
8244 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng1
8245 use rrlw_kg01, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, kao_mn2, kbo_mn2, &
8246 selfrefo, forrefo, &
8247 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, ka_mn2, kb_mn2, &
8248 selfref, forref
8249
8250! ------- Local -------
8251 integer(kind=im) :: jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
8252 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumk1, sumk2, sumf1, sumf2
8253
8254
8255 do jt = 1,5
8256 do jp = 1,13
8257 iprsm = 0
8258 do igc = 1,ngc(1)
8259 sumk = 0.
8260 do ipr = 1, ngn(igc)
8261 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8262 sumk = sumk + kao(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm)
8263 enddo
8264 ka(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8265 enddo
8266 enddo
8267 do jp = 13,59
8268 iprsm = 0
8269 do igc = 1,ngc(1)
8270 sumk = 0.
8271 do ipr = 1, ngn(igc)
8272 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8273 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm)
8274 enddo
8275 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8276 enddo
8277 enddo
8278 enddo
8279
8280 do jt = 1,10
8281 iprsm = 0
8282 do igc = 1,ngc(1)
8283 sumk = 0.
8284 do ipr = 1, ngn(igc)
8285 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8286 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm)
8287 enddo
8288 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
8289 enddo
8290 enddo
8291
8292 do jt = 1,4
8293 iprsm = 0
8294 do igc = 1,ngc(1)
8295 sumk = 0.
8296 do ipr = 1, ngn(igc)
8297 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8298 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm)
8299 enddo
8300 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
8301 enddo
8302 enddo
8303
8304 do jt = 1,19
8305 iprsm = 0
8306 do igc = 1,ngc(1)
8307 sumk1 = 0.
8308 sumk2 = 0.
8309 do ipr = 1, ngn(igc)
8310 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8311 sumk1 = sumk1 + kao_mn2(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm)
8312 sumk2 = sumk2 + kbo_mn2(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm)
8313 enddo
8314 ka_mn2(jt,igc) = sumk1
8315 kb_mn2(jt,igc) = sumk2
8316 enddo
8317 enddo
8318
8319 iprsm = 0
8320 do igc = 1,ngc(1)
8321 sumf1 = 0.
8322 sumf2 = 0.
8323 do ipr = 1, ngn(igc)
8324 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8325 sumf1= sumf1+ fracrefao(iprsm)
8326 sumf2= sumf2+ fracrefbo(iprsm)
8327 enddo
8328 fracrefa(igc) = sumf1
8329 fracrefb(igc) = sumf2
8330 enddo
8331
8332 end subroutine cmbgb1
8333
8334!***************************************************************************
8335 subroutine cmbgb2
8336!***************************************************************************
8337!
8338! band 2: 350-500 cm-1 (low key - h2o; high key - h2o)
8339!
8340! note: previous version of rrtm band 2:
8341! 250 - 500 cm-1 (low - h2o; high - h2o)
8342!***************************************************************************
8343
8344 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng2
8345 use rrlw_kg02, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, selfrefo, forrefo, &
8346 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, selfref, forref
8347
8348! ------- Local -------
8349 integer(kind=im) :: jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
8350 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf1, sumf2
8351
8352
8353 do jt = 1,5
8354 do jp = 1,13
8355 iprsm = 0
8356 do igc = 1,ngc(2)
8357 sumk = 0.
8358 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(1)+igc)
8359 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8360 sumk = sumk + kao(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+16)
8361 enddo
8362 ka(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8363 enddo
8364 enddo
8365 do jp = 13,59
8366 iprsm = 0
8367 do igc = 1,ngc(2)
8368 sumk = 0.
8369 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(1)+igc)
8370 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8371 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+16)
8372 enddo
8373 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8374 enddo
8375 enddo
8376 enddo
8377
8378 do jt = 1,10
8379 iprsm = 0
8380 do igc = 1,ngc(2)
8381 sumk = 0.
8382 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(1)+igc)
8383 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8384 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+16)
8385 enddo
8386 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
8387 enddo
8388 enddo
8389
8390 do jt = 1,4
8391 iprsm = 0
8392 do igc = 1,ngc(2)
8393 sumk = 0.
8394 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(1)+igc)
8395 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8396 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+16)
8397 enddo
8398 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
8399 enddo
8400 enddo
8401
8402 iprsm = 0
8403 do igc = 1,ngc(2)
8404 sumf1 = 0.
8405 sumf2 = 0.
8406 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(1)+igc)
8407 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8408 sumf1= sumf1+ fracrefao(iprsm)
8409 sumf2= sumf2+ fracrefbo(iprsm)
8410 enddo
8411 fracrefa(igc) = sumf1
8412 fracrefb(igc) = sumf2
8413 enddo
8414
8415 end subroutine cmbgb2
8416
8417!***************************************************************************
8418 subroutine cmbgb3
8419!***************************************************************************
8420!
8421! band 3: 500-630 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; low minor - n2o)
8422! (high key - h2o,co2; high minor - n2o)
8423!
8424! old band 3: 500-630 cm-1 (low - h2o,co2; high - h2o,co2)
8425!***************************************************************************
8426
8427 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng3
8428 use rrlw_kg03, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, kao_mn2o, kbo_mn2o, &
8429 selfrefo, forrefo, &
8430 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, ka_mn2o, kb_mn2o, &
8431 selfref, forref
8432
8433! ------- Local -------
8434 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
8435 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf
8436
8437
8438 do jn = 1,9
8439 do jt = 1,5
8440 do jp = 1,13
8441 iprsm = 0
8442 do igc = 1,ngc(3)
8443 sumk = 0.
8444 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(2)+igc)
8445 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8446 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+32)
8447 enddo
8448 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8449 enddo
8450 enddo
8451 enddo
8452 enddo
8453 do jn = 1,5
8454 do jt = 1,5
8455 do jp = 13,59
8456 iprsm = 0
8457 do igc = 1,ngc(3)
8458 sumk = 0.
8459 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(2)+igc)
8460 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8461 sumk = sumk + kbo(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+32)
8462 enddo
8463 kb(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8464 enddo
8465 enddo
8466 enddo
8467 enddo
8468
8469 do jn = 1,9
8470 do jt = 1,19
8471 iprsm = 0
8472 do igc = 1,ngc(3)
8473 sumk = 0.
8474 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(2)+igc)
8475 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8476 sumk = sumk + kao_mn2o(jn,jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+32)
8477 enddo
8478 ka_mn2o(jn,jt,igc) = sumk
8479 enddo
8480 enddo
8481 enddo
8482
8483 do jn = 1,5
8484 do jt = 1,19
8485 iprsm = 0
8486 do igc = 1,ngc(3)
8487 sumk = 0.
8488 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(2)+igc)
8489 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8490 sumk = sumk + kbo_mn2o(jn,jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+32)
8491 enddo
8492 kb_mn2o(jn,jt,igc) = sumk
8493 enddo
8494 enddo
8495 enddo
8496
8497 do jt = 1,10
8498 iprsm = 0
8499 do igc = 1,ngc(3)
8500 sumk = 0.
8501 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(2)+igc)
8502 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8503 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+32)
8504 enddo
8505 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
8506 enddo
8507 enddo
8508
8509 do jt = 1,4
8510 iprsm = 0
8511 do igc = 1,ngc(3)
8512 sumk = 0.
8513 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(2)+igc)
8514 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8515 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+32)
8516 enddo
8517 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
8518 enddo
8519 enddo
8520
8521 do jp = 1,9
8522 iprsm = 0
8523 do igc = 1,ngc(3)
8524 sumf = 0.
8525 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(2)+igc)
8526 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8527 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
8528 enddo
8529 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
8530 enddo
8531 enddo
8532
8533 do jp = 1,5
8534 iprsm = 0
8535 do igc = 1,ngc(3)
8536 sumf = 0.
8537 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(2)+igc)
8538 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8539 sumf = sumf + fracrefbo(iprsm,jp)
8540 enddo
8541 fracrefb(igc,jp) = sumf
8542 enddo
8543 enddo
8544
8545 end subroutine cmbgb3
8546
8547!***************************************************************************
8548 subroutine cmbgb4
8549!***************************************************************************
8550!
8551! band 4: 630-700 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; high key - o3,co2)
8552!
8553! old band 4: 630-700 cm-1 (low - h2o,co2; high - o3,co2)
8554!***************************************************************************
8555
8556 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng4
8557 use rrlw_kg04, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, selfrefo, forrefo, &
8558 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, selfref, forref
8559
8560! ------- Local -------
8561 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
8562 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf
8563
8564
8565 do jn = 1,9
8566 do jt = 1,5
8567 do jp = 1,13
8568 iprsm = 0
8569 do igc = 1,ngc(4)
8570 sumk = 0.
8571 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(3)+igc)
8572 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8573 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+48)
8574 enddo
8575 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8576 enddo
8577 enddo
8578 enddo
8579 enddo
8580 do jn = 1,5
8581 do jt = 1,5
8582 do jp = 13,59
8583 iprsm = 0
8584 do igc = 1,ngc(4)
8585 sumk = 0.
8586 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(3)+igc)
8587 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8588 sumk = sumk + kbo(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+48)
8589 enddo
8590 kb(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8591 enddo
8592 enddo
8593 enddo
8594 enddo
8595
8596 do jt = 1,10
8597 iprsm = 0
8598 do igc = 1,ngc(4)
8599 sumk = 0.
8600 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(3)+igc)
8601 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8602 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+48)
8603 enddo
8604 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
8605 enddo
8606 enddo
8607
8608 do jt = 1,4
8609 iprsm = 0
8610 do igc = 1,ngc(4)
8611 sumk = 0.
8612 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(3)+igc)
8613 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8614 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+48)
8615 enddo
8616 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
8617 enddo
8618 enddo
8619
8620 do jp = 1,9
8621 iprsm = 0
8622 do igc = 1,ngc(4)
8623 sumf = 0.
8624 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(3)+igc)
8625 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8626 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
8627 enddo
8628 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
8629 enddo
8630 enddo
8631
8632 do jp = 1,5
8633 iprsm = 0
8634 do igc = 1,ngc(4)
8635 sumf = 0.
8636 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(3)+igc)
8637 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8638 sumf = sumf + fracrefbo(iprsm,jp)
8639 enddo
8640 fracrefb(igc,jp) = sumf
8641 enddo
8642 enddo
8643
8644 end subroutine cmbgb4
8645
8646!***************************************************************************
8647 subroutine cmbgb5
8648!***************************************************************************
8649!
8650! band 5: 700-820 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; low minor - o3, ccl4)
8651! (high key - o3,co2)
8652!
8653! old band 5: 700-820 cm-1 (low - h2o,co2; high - o3,co2)
8654!***************************************************************************
8655
8656 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng5
8657 use rrlw_kg05, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, kao_mo3, ccl4o, &
8658 selfrefo, forrefo, &
8659 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, ka_mo3, ccl4, &
8660 selfref, forref
8661
8662! ------- Local -------
8663 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
8664 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf
8665
8666
8667 do jn = 1,9
8668 do jt = 1,5
8669 do jp = 1,13
8670 iprsm = 0
8671 do igc = 1,ngc(5)
8672 sumk = 0.
8673 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(4)+igc)
8674 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8675 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+64)
8676 enddo
8677 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8678 enddo
8679 enddo
8680 enddo
8681 enddo
8682 do jn = 1,5
8683 do jt = 1,5
8684 do jp = 13,59
8685 iprsm = 0
8686 do igc = 1,ngc(5)
8687 sumk = 0.
8688 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(4)+igc)
8689 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8690 sumk = sumk + kbo(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+64)
8691 enddo
8692 kb(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8693 enddo
8694 enddo
8695 enddo
8696 enddo
8697
8698 do jn = 1,9
8699 do jt = 1,19
8700 iprsm = 0
8701 do igc = 1,ngc(5)
8702 sumk = 0.
8703 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(4)+igc)
8704 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8705 sumk = sumk + kao_mo3(jn,jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+64)
8706 enddo
8707 ka_mo3(jn,jt,igc) = sumk
8708 enddo
8709 enddo
8710 enddo
8711
8712 do jt = 1,10
8713 iprsm = 0
8714 do igc = 1,ngc(5)
8715 sumk = 0.
8716 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(4)+igc)
8717 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8718 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+64)
8719 enddo
8720 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
8721 enddo
8722 enddo
8723
8724 do jt = 1,4
8725 iprsm = 0
8726 do igc = 1,ngc(5)
8727 sumk = 0.
8728 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(4)+igc)
8729 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8730 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+64)
8731 enddo
8732 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
8733 enddo
8734 enddo
8735
8736 do jp = 1,9
8737 iprsm = 0
8738 do igc = 1,ngc(5)
8739 sumf = 0.
8740 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(4)+igc)
8741 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8742 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
8743 enddo
8744 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
8745 enddo
8746 enddo
8747
8748 do jp = 1,5
8749 iprsm = 0
8750 do igc = 1,ngc(5)
8751 sumf = 0.
8752 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(4)+igc)
8753 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8754 sumf = sumf + fracrefbo(iprsm,jp)
8755 enddo
8756 fracrefb(igc,jp) = sumf
8757 enddo
8758 enddo
8759
8760 iprsm = 0
8761 do igc = 1,ngc(5)
8762 sumk = 0.
8763 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(4)+igc)
8764 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8765 sumk = sumk + ccl4o(iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+64)
8766 enddo
8767 ccl4(igc) = sumk
8768 enddo
8769
8770 end subroutine cmbgb5
8771
8772!***************************************************************************
8773 subroutine cmbgb6
8774!***************************************************************************
8775!
8776! band 6: 820-980 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - co2)
8777! (high key - nothing; high minor - cfc11, cfc12)
8778!
8779! old band 6: 820-980 cm-1 (low - h2o; high - nothing)
8780!***************************************************************************
8781
8782 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng6
8783 use rrlw_kg06, only: fracrefao, kao, kao_mco2, cfc11adjo, cfc12o, &
8784 selfrefo, forrefo, &
8785 fracrefa, absa, ka, ka_mco2, cfc11adj, cfc12, &
8786 selfref, forref
8787
8788! ------- Local -------
8789 integer(kind=im) :: jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
8790 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf, sumk1, sumk2
8791
8792
8793 do jt = 1,5
8794 do jp = 1,13
8795 iprsm = 0
8796 do igc = 1,ngc(6)
8797 sumk = 0.
8798 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(5)+igc)
8799 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8800 sumk = sumk + kao(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+80)
8801 enddo
8802 ka(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8803 enddo
8804 enddo
8805 enddo
8806
8807 do jt = 1,19
8808 iprsm = 0
8809 do igc = 1,ngc(6)
8810 sumk = 0.
8811 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(5)+igc)
8812 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8813 sumk = sumk + kao_mco2(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+80)
8814 enddo
8815 ka_mco2(jt,igc) = sumk
8816 enddo
8817 enddo
8818
8819 do jt = 1,10
8820 iprsm = 0
8821 do igc = 1,ngc(6)
8822 sumk = 0.
8823 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(5)+igc)
8824 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8825 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+80)
8826 enddo
8827 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
8828 enddo
8829 enddo
8830
8831 do jt = 1,4
8832 iprsm = 0
8833 do igc = 1,ngc(6)
8834 sumk = 0.
8835 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(5)+igc)
8836 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8837 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+80)
8838 enddo
8839 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
8840 enddo
8841 enddo
8842
8843 iprsm = 0
8844 do igc = 1,ngc(6)
8845 sumf = 0.
8846 sumk1= 0.
8847 sumk2= 0.
8848 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(5)+igc)
8849 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8850 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm)
8851 sumk1= sumk1+ cfc11adjo(iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+80)
8852 sumk2= sumk2+ cfc12o(iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+80)
8853 enddo
8854 fracrefa(igc) = sumf
8855 cfc11adj(igc) = sumk1
8856 cfc12(igc) = sumk2
8857 enddo
8858
8859 end subroutine cmbgb6
8860
8861!***************************************************************************
8862 subroutine cmbgb7
8863!***************************************************************************
8864!
8865! band 7: 980-1080 cm-1 (low key - h2o,o3; low minor - co2)
8866! (high key - o3; high minor - co2)
8867!
8868! old band 7: 980-1080 cm-1 (low - h2o,o3; high - o3)
8869!***************************************************************************
8870
8871 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng7
8872 use rrlw_kg07, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, kao_mco2, kbo_mco2, &
8873 selfrefo, forrefo, &
8874 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, ka_mco2, kb_mco2, &
8875 selfref, forref
8876
8877! ------- Local -------
8878 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
8879 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf
8880
8881
8882 do jn = 1,9
8883 do jt = 1,5
8884 do jp = 1,13
8885 iprsm = 0
8886 do igc = 1,ngc(7)
8887 sumk = 0.
8888 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(6)+igc)
8889 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8890 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+96)
8891 enddo
8892 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8893 enddo
8894 enddo
8895 enddo
8896 enddo
8897 do jt = 1,5
8898 do jp = 13,59
8899 iprsm = 0
8900 do igc = 1,ngc(7)
8901 sumk = 0.
8902 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(6)+igc)
8903 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8904 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+96)
8905 enddo
8906 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
8907 enddo
8908 enddo
8909 enddo
8910
8911 do jn = 1,9
8912 do jt = 1,19
8913 iprsm = 0
8914 do igc = 1,ngc(7)
8915 sumk = 0.
8916 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(6)+igc)
8917 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8918 sumk = sumk + kao_mco2(jn,jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+96)
8919 enddo
8920 ka_mco2(jn,jt,igc) = sumk
8921 enddo
8922 enddo
8923 enddo
8924
8925 do jt = 1,19
8926 iprsm = 0
8927 do igc = 1,ngc(7)
8928 sumk = 0.
8929 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(6)+igc)
8930 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8931 sumk = sumk + kbo_mco2(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+96)
8932 enddo
8933 kb_mco2(jt,igc) = sumk
8934 enddo
8935 enddo
8936
8937 do jt = 1,10
8938 iprsm = 0
8939 do igc = 1,ngc(7)
8940 sumk = 0.
8941 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(6)+igc)
8942 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8943 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+96)
8944 enddo
8945 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
8946 enddo
8947 enddo
8948
8949 do jt = 1,4
8950 iprsm = 0
8951 do igc = 1,ngc(7)
8952 sumk = 0.
8953 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(6)+igc)
8954 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8955 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+96)
8956 enddo
8957 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
8958 enddo
8959 enddo
8960
8961 do jp = 1,9
8962 iprsm = 0
8963 do igc = 1,ngc(7)
8964 sumf = 0.
8965 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(6)+igc)
8966 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8967 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
8968 enddo
8969 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
8970 enddo
8971 enddo
8972
8973 iprsm = 0
8974 do igc = 1,ngc(7)
8975 sumf = 0.
8976 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(6)+igc)
8977 iprsm = iprsm + 1
8978 sumf = sumf + fracrefbo(iprsm)
8979 enddo
8980 fracrefb(igc) = sumf
8981 enddo
8982
8983 end subroutine cmbgb7
8984
8985!***************************************************************************
8986 subroutine cmbgb8
8987!***************************************************************************
8988!
8989! band 8: 1080-1180 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - co2,o3,n2o)
8990! (high key - o3; high minor - co2, n2o)
8991!
8992! old band 8: 1080-1180 cm-1 (low (i.e.>~300mb) - h2o; high - o3)
8993!***************************************************************************
8994
8995 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng8
8996 use rrlw_kg08, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kao_mco2, kao_mn2o, &
8997 kao_mo3, kbo, kbo_mco2, kbo_mn2o, selfrefo, forrefo, &
8998 cfc12o, cfc22adjo, &
8999 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, ka_mco2, ka_mn2o, &
9000 ka_mo3, absb, kb, kb_mco2, kb_mn2o, selfref, forref, &
9001 cfc12, cfc22adj
9002
9003! ------- Local -------
9004 integer(kind=im) :: jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9005 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumk1, sumk2, sumk3, sumk4, sumk5, sumf1, sumf2
9006
9007
9008 do jt = 1,5
9009 do jp = 1,13
9010 iprsm = 0
9011 do igc = 1,ngc(8)
9012 sumk = 0.
9013 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(7)+igc)
9014 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9015 sumk = sumk + kao(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9016 enddo
9017 ka(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9018 enddo
9019 enddo
9020 enddo
9021 do jt = 1,5
9022 do jp = 13,59
9023 iprsm = 0
9024 do igc = 1,ngc(8)
9025 sumk = 0.
9026 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(7)+igc)
9027 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9028 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9029 enddo
9030 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9031 enddo
9032 enddo
9033 enddo
9034
9035 do jt = 1,10
9036 iprsm = 0
9037 do igc = 1,ngc(8)
9038 sumk = 0.
9039 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(7)+igc)
9040 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9041 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9042 enddo
9043 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9044 enddo
9045 enddo
9046
9047 do jt = 1,4
9048 iprsm = 0
9049 do igc = 1,ngc(8)
9050 sumk = 0.
9051 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(7)+igc)
9052 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9053 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9054 enddo
9055 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9056 enddo
9057 enddo
9058
9059 do jt = 1,19
9060 iprsm = 0
9061 do igc = 1,ngc(8)
9062 sumk1 = 0.
9063 sumk2 = 0.
9064 sumk3 = 0.
9065 sumk4 = 0.
9066 sumk5 = 0.
9067 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(7)+igc)
9068 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9069 sumk1 = sumk1 + kao_mco2(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9070 sumk2 = sumk2 + kbo_mco2(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9071 sumk3 = sumk3 + kao_mo3(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9072 sumk4 = sumk4 + kao_mn2o(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9073 sumk5 = sumk5 + kbo_mn2o(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9074 enddo
9075 ka_mco2(jt,igc) = sumk1
9076 kb_mco2(jt,igc) = sumk2
9077 ka_mo3(jt,igc) = sumk3
9078 ka_mn2o(jt,igc) = sumk4
9079 kb_mn2o(jt,igc) = sumk5
9080 enddo
9081 enddo
9082
9083 iprsm = 0
9084 do igc = 1,ngc(8)
9085 sumf1= 0.
9086 sumf2= 0.
9087 sumk1= 0.
9088 sumk2= 0.
9089 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(7)+igc)
9090 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9091 sumf1= sumf1+ fracrefao(iprsm)
9092 sumf2= sumf2+ fracrefbo(iprsm)
9093 sumk1= sumk1+ cfc12o(iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9094 sumk2= sumk2+ cfc22adjo(iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+112)
9095 enddo
9096 fracrefa(igc) = sumf1
9097 fracrefb(igc) = sumf2
9098 cfc12(igc) = sumk1
9099 cfc22adj(igc) = sumk2
9100 enddo
9101
9102 end subroutine cmbgb8
9103
9104!***************************************************************************
9105 subroutine cmbgb9
9106!***************************************************************************
9107!
9108! band 9: 1180-1390 cm-1 (low key - h2o,ch4; low minor - n2o)
9109! (high key - ch4; high minor - n2o)!
9110
9111! old band 9: 1180-1390 cm-1 (low - h2o,ch4; high - ch4)
9112!***************************************************************************
9113
9114 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng9
9115 use rrlw_kg09, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kao_mn2o, &
9116 kbo, kbo_mn2o, selfrefo, forrefo, &
9117 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, ka_mn2o, &
9118 absb, kb, kb_mn2o, selfref, forref
9119
9120! ------- Local -------
9121 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9122 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf
9123
9124
9125 do jn = 1,9
9126 do jt = 1,5
9127 do jp = 1,13
9128 iprsm = 0
9129 do igc = 1,ngc(9)
9130 sumk = 0.
9131 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(8)+igc)
9132 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9133 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+128)
9134 enddo
9135 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9136 enddo
9137 enddo
9138 enddo
9139 enddo
9140
9141 do jt = 1,5
9142 do jp = 13,59
9143 iprsm = 0
9144 do igc = 1,ngc(9)
9145 sumk = 0.
9146 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(8)+igc)
9147 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9148 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+128)
9149 enddo
9150 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9151 enddo
9152 enddo
9153 enddo
9154
9155 do jn = 1,9
9156 do jt = 1,19
9157 iprsm = 0
9158 do igc = 1,ngc(9)
9159 sumk = 0.
9160 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(8)+igc)
9161 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9162 sumk = sumk + kao_mn2o(jn,jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+128)
9163 enddo
9164 ka_mn2o(jn,jt,igc) = sumk
9165 enddo
9166 enddo
9167 enddo
9168
9169 do jt = 1,19
9170 iprsm = 0
9171 do igc = 1,ngc(9)
9172 sumk = 0.
9173 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(8)+igc)
9174 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9175 sumk = sumk + kbo_mn2o(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+128)
9176 enddo
9177 kb_mn2o(jt,igc) = sumk
9178 enddo
9179 enddo
9180
9181 do jt = 1,10
9182 iprsm = 0
9183 do igc = 1,ngc(9)
9184 sumk = 0.
9185 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(8)+igc)
9186 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9187 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+128)
9188 enddo
9189 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9190 enddo
9191 enddo
9192
9193 do jt = 1,4
9194 iprsm = 0
9195 do igc = 1,ngc(9)
9196 sumk = 0.
9197 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(8)+igc)
9198 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9199 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+128)
9200 enddo
9201 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9202 enddo
9203 enddo
9204
9205 do jp = 1,9
9206 iprsm = 0
9207 do igc = 1,ngc(9)
9208 sumf = 0.
9209 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(8)+igc)
9210 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9211 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
9212 enddo
9213 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
9214 enddo
9215 enddo
9216
9217 iprsm = 0
9218 do igc = 1,ngc(9)
9219 sumf = 0.
9220 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(8)+igc)
9221 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9222 sumf = sumf + fracrefbo(iprsm)
9223 enddo
9224 fracrefb(igc) = sumf
9225 enddo
9226
9227 end subroutine cmbgb9
9228
9229!***************************************************************************
9230 subroutine cmbgb10
9231!***************************************************************************
9232!
9233! band 10: 1390-1480 cm-1 (low key - h2o; high key - h2o)
9234!
9235! old band 10: 1390-1480 cm-1 (low - h2o; high - h2o)
9236!***************************************************************************
9237
9238 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng10
9239 use rrlw_kg10, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, &
9240 selfrefo, forrefo, &
9241 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, &
9242 selfref, forref
9243
9244! ------- Local -------
9245 integer(kind=im) :: jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9246 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf1, sumf2
9247
9248
9249 do jt = 1,5
9250 do jp = 1,13
9251 iprsm = 0
9252 do igc = 1,ngc(10)
9253 sumk = 0.
9254 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(9)+igc)
9255 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9256 sumk = sumk + kao(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+144)
9257 enddo
9258 ka(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9259 enddo
9260 enddo
9261 enddo
9262
9263 do jt = 1,5
9264 do jp = 13,59
9265 iprsm = 0
9266 do igc = 1,ngc(10)
9267 sumk = 0.
9268 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(9)+igc)
9269 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9270 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+144)
9271 enddo
9272 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9273 enddo
9274 enddo
9275 enddo
9276
9277 do jt = 1,10
9278 iprsm = 0
9279 do igc = 1,ngc(10)
9280 sumk = 0.
9281 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(9)+igc)
9282 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9283 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+144)
9284 enddo
9285 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9286 enddo
9287 enddo
9288
9289 do jt = 1,4
9290 iprsm = 0
9291 do igc = 1,ngc(10)
9292 sumk = 0.
9293 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(9)+igc)
9294 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9295 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+144)
9296 enddo
9297 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9298 enddo
9299 enddo
9300
9301 iprsm = 0
9302 do igc = 1,ngc(10)
9303 sumf1= 0.
9304 sumf2= 0.
9305 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(9)+igc)
9306 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9307 sumf1= sumf1+ fracrefao(iprsm)
9308 sumf2= sumf2+ fracrefbo(iprsm)
9309 enddo
9310 fracrefa(igc) = sumf1
9311 fracrefb(igc) = sumf2
9312 enddo
9313
9314 end subroutine cmbgb10
9315
9316!***************************************************************************
9317 subroutine cmbgb11
9318!***************************************************************************
9319!
9320! band 11: 1480-1800 cm-1 (low - h2o; low minor - o2)
9321! (high key - h2o; high minor - o2)
9322!
9323! old band 11: 1480-1800 cm-1 (low - h2o; low minor - o2)
9324! (high key - h2o; high minor - o2)
9325!***************************************************************************
9326
9327 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng11
9328 use rrlw_kg11, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kao_mo2, &
9329 kbo, kbo_mo2, selfrefo, forrefo, &
9330 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, ka_mo2, &
9331 absb, kb, kb_mo2, selfref, forref
9332
9333! ------- Local -------
9334 integer(kind=im) :: jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9335 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumk1, sumk2, sumf1, sumf2
9336
9337
9338 do jt = 1,5
9339 do jp = 1,13
9340 iprsm = 0
9341 do igc = 1,ngc(11)
9342 sumk = 0.
9343 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(10)+igc)
9344 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9345 sumk = sumk + kao(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+160)
9346 enddo
9347 ka(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9348 enddo
9349 enddo
9350 enddo
9351 do jt = 1,5
9352 do jp = 13,59
9353 iprsm = 0
9354 do igc = 1,ngc(11)
9355 sumk = 0.
9356 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(10)+igc)
9357 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9358 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+160)
9359 enddo
9360 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9361 enddo
9362 enddo
9363 enddo
9364
9365 do jt = 1,19
9366 iprsm = 0
9367 do igc = 1,ngc(11)
9368 sumk1 = 0.
9369 sumk2 = 0.
9370 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(10)+igc)
9371 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9372 sumk1 = sumk1 + kao_mo2(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+160)
9373 sumk2 = sumk2 + kbo_mo2(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+160)
9374 enddo
9375 ka_mo2(jt,igc) = sumk1
9376 kb_mo2(jt,igc) = sumk2
9377 enddo
9378 enddo
9379
9380 do jt = 1,10
9381 iprsm = 0
9382 do igc = 1,ngc(11)
9383 sumk = 0.
9384 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(10)+igc)
9385 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9386 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+160)
9387 enddo
9388 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9389 enddo
9390 enddo
9391
9392 do jt = 1,4
9393 iprsm = 0
9394 do igc = 1,ngc(11)
9395 sumk = 0.
9396 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(10)+igc)
9397 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9398 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+160)
9399 enddo
9400 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9401 enddo
9402 enddo
9403
9404 iprsm = 0
9405 do igc = 1,ngc(11)
9406 sumf1= 0.
9407 sumf2= 0.
9408 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(10)+igc)
9409 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9410 sumf1= sumf1+ fracrefao(iprsm)
9411 sumf2= sumf2+ fracrefbo(iprsm)
9412 enddo
9413 fracrefa(igc) = sumf1
9414 fracrefb(igc) = sumf2
9415 enddo
9416
9417 end subroutine cmbgb11
9418
9419!***************************************************************************
9420 subroutine cmbgb12
9421!***************************************************************************
9422!
9423! band 12: 1800-2080 cm-1 (low - h2o,co2; high - nothing)
9424!
9425! old band 12: 1800-2080 cm-1 (low - h2o,co2; high - nothing)
9426!***************************************************************************
9427
9428 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng12
9429 use rrlw_kg12, only: fracrefao, kao, selfrefo, forrefo, &
9430 fracrefa, absa, ka, selfref, forref
9431
9432! ------- Local -------
9433 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9434 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf
9435
9436
9437 do jn = 1,9
9438 do jt = 1,5
9439 do jp = 1,13
9440 iprsm = 0
9441 do igc = 1,ngc(12)
9442 sumk = 0.
9443 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(11)+igc)
9444 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9445 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+176)
9446 enddo
9447 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9448 enddo
9449 enddo
9450 enddo
9451 enddo
9452
9453 do jt = 1,10
9454 iprsm = 0
9455 do igc = 1,ngc(12)
9456 sumk = 0.
9457 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(11)+igc)
9458 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9459 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+176)
9460 enddo
9461 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9462 enddo
9463 enddo
9464
9465 do jt = 1,4
9466 iprsm = 0
9467 do igc = 1,ngc(12)
9468 sumk = 0.
9469 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(11)+igc)
9470 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9471 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+176)
9472 enddo
9473 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9474 enddo
9475 enddo
9476
9477 do jp = 1,9
9478 iprsm = 0
9479 do igc = 1,ngc(12)
9480 sumf = 0.
9481 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(11)+igc)
9482 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9483 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
9484 enddo
9485 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
9486 enddo
9487 enddo
9488
9489 end subroutine cmbgb12
9490
9491!***************************************************************************
9492 subroutine cmbgb13
9493!***************************************************************************
9494!
9495! band 13: 2080-2250 cm-1 (low key - h2o,n2o; high minor - o3 minor)
9496!
9497! old band 13: 2080-2250 cm-1 (low - h2o,n2o; high - nothing)
9498!***************************************************************************
9499
9500 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng13
9501 use rrlw_kg13, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kao_mco2, kao_mco, &
9502 kbo_mo3, selfrefo, forrefo, &
9503 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, ka_mco2, ka_mco, &
9504 kb_mo3, selfref, forref
9505
9506! ------- Local -------
9507 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9508 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumk1, sumk2, sumf
9509
9510
9511 do jn = 1,9
9512 do jt = 1,5
9513 do jp = 1,13
9514 iprsm = 0
9515 do igc = 1,ngc(13)
9516 sumk = 0.
9517 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(12)+igc)
9518 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9519 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+192)
9520 enddo
9521 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9522 enddo
9523 enddo
9524 enddo
9525 enddo
9526
9527 do jn = 1,9
9528 do jt = 1,19
9529 iprsm = 0
9530 do igc = 1,ngc(13)
9531 sumk1 = 0.
9532 sumk2 = 0.
9533 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(12)+igc)
9534 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9535 sumk1 = sumk1 + kao_mco2(jn,jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+192)
9536 sumk2 = sumk2 + kao_mco(jn,jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+192)
9537 enddo
9538 ka_mco2(jn,jt,igc) = sumk1
9539 ka_mco(jn,jt,igc) = sumk2
9540 enddo
9541 enddo
9542 enddo
9543
9544 do jt = 1,19
9545 iprsm = 0
9546 do igc = 1,ngc(13)
9547 sumk = 0.
9548 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(12)+igc)
9549 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9550 sumk = sumk + kbo_mo3(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+192)
9551 enddo
9552 kb_mo3(jt,igc) = sumk
9553 enddo
9554 enddo
9555
9556 do jt = 1,10
9557 iprsm = 0
9558 do igc = 1,ngc(13)
9559 sumk = 0.
9560 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(12)+igc)
9561 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9562 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+192)
9563 enddo
9564 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9565 enddo
9566 enddo
9567
9568 do jt = 1,4
9569 iprsm = 0
9570 do igc = 1,ngc(13)
9571 sumk = 0.
9572 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(12)+igc)
9573 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9574 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+192)
9575 enddo
9576 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9577 enddo
9578 enddo
9579
9580 iprsm = 0
9581 do igc = 1,ngc(13)
9582 sumf = 0.
9583 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(12)+igc)
9584 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9585 sumf = sumf + fracrefbo(iprsm)
9586 enddo
9587 fracrefb(igc) = sumf
9588 enddo
9589
9590 do jp = 1,9
9591 iprsm = 0
9592 do igc = 1,ngc(13)
9593 sumf = 0.
9594 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(12)+igc)
9595 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9596 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
9597 enddo
9598 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
9599 enddo
9600 enddo
9601
9602 end subroutine cmbgb13
9603
9604!***************************************************************************
9605 subroutine cmbgb14
9606!***************************************************************************
9607!
9608! band 14: 2250-2380 cm-1 (low - co2; high - co2)
9609!
9610! old band 14: 2250-2380 cm-1 (low - co2; high - co2)
9611!***************************************************************************
9612
9613 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng14
9614 use rrlw_kg14, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, &
9615 selfrefo, forrefo, &
9616 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, &
9617 selfref, forref
9618
9619! ------- Local -------
9620 integer(kind=im) :: jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9621 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf1, sumf2
9622
9623
9624 do jt = 1,5
9625 do jp = 1,13
9626 iprsm = 0
9627 do igc = 1,ngc(14)
9628 sumk = 0.
9629 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(13)+igc)
9630 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9631 sumk = sumk + kao(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+208)
9632 enddo
9633 ka(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9634 enddo
9635 enddo
9636 enddo
9637
9638 do jt = 1,5
9639 do jp = 13,59
9640 iprsm = 0
9641 do igc = 1,ngc(14)
9642 sumk = 0.
9643 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(13)+igc)
9644 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9645 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+208)
9646 enddo
9647 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9648 enddo
9649 enddo
9650 enddo
9651
9652 do jt = 1,10
9653 iprsm = 0
9654 do igc = 1,ngc(14)
9655 sumk = 0.
9656 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(13)+igc)
9657 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9658 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+208)
9659 enddo
9660 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9661 enddo
9662 enddo
9663
9664 do jt = 1,4
9665 iprsm = 0
9666 do igc = 1,ngc(14)
9667 sumk = 0.
9668 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(13)+igc)
9669 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9670 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+208)
9671 enddo
9672 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9673 enddo
9674 enddo
9675
9676 iprsm = 0
9677 do igc = 1,ngc(14)
9678 sumf1= 0.
9679 sumf2= 0.
9680 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(13)+igc)
9681 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9682 sumf1= sumf1+ fracrefao(iprsm)
9683 sumf2= sumf2+ fracrefbo(iprsm)
9684 enddo
9685 fracrefa(igc) = sumf1
9686 fracrefb(igc) = sumf2
9687 enddo
9688
9689 end subroutine cmbgb14
9690
9691!***************************************************************************
9692 subroutine cmbgb15
9693!***************************************************************************
9694!
9695! band 15: 2380-2600 cm-1 (low - n2o,co2; low minor - n2)
9696! (high - nothing)
9697!
9698! old band 15: 2380-2600 cm-1 (low - n2o,co2; high - nothing)
9699!***************************************************************************
9700
9701 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng15
9702 use rrlw_kg15, only: fracrefao, kao, kao_mn2, selfrefo, forrefo, &
9703 fracrefa, absa, ka, ka_mn2, selfref, forref
9704
9705! ------- Local -------
9706 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9707 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf
9708
9709
9710 do jn = 1,9
9711 do jt = 1,5
9712 do jp = 1,13
9713 iprsm = 0
9714 do igc = 1,ngc(15)
9715 sumk = 0.
9716 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(14)+igc)
9717 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9718 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+224)
9719 enddo
9720 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9721 enddo
9722 enddo
9723 enddo
9724 enddo
9725
9726 do jn = 1,9
9727 do jt = 1,19
9728 iprsm = 0
9729 do igc = 1,ngc(15)
9730 sumk = 0.
9731 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(14)+igc)
9732 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9733 sumk = sumk + kao_mn2(jn,jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+224)
9734 enddo
9735 ka_mn2(jn,jt,igc) = sumk
9736 enddo
9737 enddo
9738 enddo
9739
9740 do jt = 1,10
9741 iprsm = 0
9742 do igc = 1,ngc(15)
9743 sumk = 0.
9744 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(14)+igc)
9745 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9746 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+224)
9747 enddo
9748 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9749 enddo
9750 enddo
9751
9752 do jt = 1,4
9753 iprsm = 0
9754 do igc = 1,ngc(15)
9755 sumk = 0.
9756 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(14)+igc)
9757 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9758 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+224)
9759 enddo
9760 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9761 enddo
9762 enddo
9763
9764 do jp = 1,9
9765 iprsm = 0
9766 do igc = 1,ngc(15)
9767 sumf = 0.
9768 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(14)+igc)
9769 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9770 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
9771 enddo
9772 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
9773 enddo
9774 enddo
9775
9776 end subroutine cmbgb15
9777
9778!***************************************************************************
9779 subroutine cmbgb16
9780!***************************************************************************
9781!
9782! band 16: 2600-3250 cm-1 (low key- h2o,ch4; high key - ch4)
9783!
9784! old band 16: 2600-3000 cm-1 (low - h2o,ch4; high - nothing)
9785!***************************************************************************
9786
9787 use parrrtm, only : mg, nbndlw, ngptlw, ng16
9788 use rrlw_kg16, only: fracrefao, fracrefbo, kao, kbo, selfrefo, forrefo, &
9789 fracrefa, fracrefb, absa, ka, absb, kb, selfref, forref
9790
9791! ------- Local -------
9792 integer(kind=im) :: jn, jt, jp, igc, ipr, iprsm
9793 real(kind=rb) :: sumk, sumf
9794
9795
9796 do jn = 1,9
9797 do jt = 1,5
9798 do jp = 1,13
9799 iprsm = 0
9800 do igc = 1,ngc(16)
9801 sumk = 0.
9802 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(15)+igc)
9803 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9804 sumk = sumk + kao(jn,jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+240)
9805 enddo
9806 ka(jn,jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9807 enddo
9808 enddo
9809 enddo
9810 enddo
9811
9812 do jt = 1,5
9813 do jp = 13,59
9814 iprsm = 0
9815 do igc = 1,ngc(16)
9816 sumk = 0.
9817 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(15)+igc)
9818 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9819 sumk = sumk + kbo(jt,jp,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+240)
9820 enddo
9821 kb(jt,jp,igc) = sumk
9822 enddo
9823 enddo
9824 enddo
9825
9826 do jt = 1,10
9827 iprsm = 0
9828 do igc = 1,ngc(16)
9829 sumk = 0.
9830 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(15)+igc)
9831 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9832 sumk = sumk + selfrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+240)
9833 enddo
9834 selfref(jt,igc) = sumk
9835 enddo
9836 enddo
9837
9838 do jt = 1,4
9839 iprsm = 0
9840 do igc = 1,ngc(16)
9841 sumk = 0.
9842 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(15)+igc)
9843 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9844 sumk = sumk + forrefo(jt,iprsm)*rwgt(iprsm+240)
9845 enddo
9846 forref(jt,igc) = sumk
9847 enddo
9848 enddo
9849
9850 iprsm = 0
9851 do igc = 1,ngc(16)
9852 sumf = 0.
9853 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(15)+igc)
9854 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9855 sumf = sumf + fracrefbo(iprsm)
9856 enddo
9857 fracrefb(igc) = sumf
9858 enddo
9859
9860 do jp = 1,9
9861 iprsm = 0
9862 do igc = 1,ngc(16)
9863 sumf = 0.
9864 do ipr = 1, ngn(ngs(15)+igc)
9865 iprsm = iprsm + 1
9866 sumf = sumf + fracrefao(iprsm,jp)
9867 enddo
9868 fracrefa(igc,jp) = sumf
9869 enddo
9870 enddo
9871
9872 end subroutine cmbgb16
9873
9874!***************************************************************************
9875 subroutine lwcldpr
9876!***************************************************************************
9877
9878! --------- Modules ----------
9879
9880 use rrlw_cld, only: abscld1, absliq0, absliq1, &
9881 absice0, absice1, absice2, absice3
9882
9883 save
9884
9885! ABSCLDn is the liquid water absorption coefficient (m2/g).
9886! For INFLAG = 1.
9887 abscld1 = 0.0602410_rb
9888!
9889! Everything below is for INFLAG = 2.
9890
9891! ABSICEn(J,IB) are the parameters needed to compute the liquid water
9892! absorption coefficient in spectral region IB for ICEFLAG=n. The units
9893! of ABSICEn(1,IB) are m2/g and ABSICEn(2,IB) has units (microns (m2/g)).
9894! For ICEFLAG = 0.
9895
9896 absice0(:)= (/0.005_rb, 1.0_rb/)
9897
9898! For ICEFLAG = 1.
9899 absice1(1,:) = (/0.0036_rb, 0.0068_rb, 0.0003_rb, 0.0016_rb, 0.0020_rb/)
9900 absice1(2,:) = (/1.136_rb , 0.600_rb , 1.338_rb , 1.166_rb , 1.118_rb /)
9901
9902! For ICEFLAG = 2. In each band, the absorption
9903! coefficients are listed for a range of effective radii from 5.0
9904! to 131.0 microns in increments of 3.0 microns.
9905! Spherical Ice Particle Parameterization
9906! absorption units (abs coef/iwc): [(m^-1)/(g m^-3)]
9907 absice2(:,1) = (/ &
9908! band 1
9909 7.798999e-02_rb,6.340479e-02_rb,5.417973e-02_rb,4.766245e-02_rb,4.272663e-02_rb, &
9910 3.880939e-02_rb,3.559544e-02_rb,3.289241e-02_rb,3.057511e-02_rb,2.855800e-02_rb, &
9911 2.678022e-02_rb,2.519712e-02_rb,2.377505e-02_rb,2.248806e-02_rb,2.131578e-02_rb, &
9912 2.024194e-02_rb,1.925337e-02_rb,1.833926e-02_rb,1.749067e-02_rb,1.670007e-02_rb, &
9913 1.596113e-02_rb,1.526845e-02_rb,1.461739e-02_rb,1.400394e-02_rb,1.342462e-02_rb, &
9914 1.287639e-02_rb,1.235656e-02_rb,1.186279e-02_rb,1.139297e-02_rb,1.094524e-02_rb, &
9915 1.051794e-02_rb,1.010956e-02_rb,9.718755e-03_rb,9.344316e-03_rb,8.985139e-03_rb, &
9916 8.640223e-03_rb,8.308656e-03_rb,7.989606e-03_rb,7.682312e-03_rb,7.386076e-03_rb, &
9917 7.100255e-03_rb,6.824258e-03_rb,6.557540e-03_rb/)
9918 absice2(:,2) = (/ &
9919! band 2
9920 2.784879e-02_rb,2.709863e-02_rb,2.619165e-02_rb,2.529230e-02_rb,2.443225e-02_rb, &
9921 2.361575e-02_rb,2.284021e-02_rb,2.210150e-02_rb,2.139548e-02_rb,2.071840e-02_rb, &
9922 2.006702e-02_rb,1.943856e-02_rb,1.883064e-02_rb,1.824120e-02_rb,1.766849e-02_rb, &
9923 1.711099e-02_rb,1.656737e-02_rb,1.603647e-02_rb,1.551727e-02_rb,1.500886e-02_rb, &
9924 1.451045e-02_rb,1.402132e-02_rb,1.354084e-02_rb,1.306842e-02_rb,1.260355e-02_rb, &
9925 1.214575e-02_rb,1.169460e-02_rb,1.124971e-02_rb,1.081072e-02_rb,1.037731e-02_rb, &
9926 9.949167e-03_rb,9.526021e-03_rb,9.107615e-03_rb,8.693714e-03_rb,8.284096e-03_rb, &
9927 7.878558e-03_rb,7.476910e-03_rb,7.078974e-03_rb,6.684586e-03_rb,6.293589e-03_rb, &
9928 5.905839e-03_rb,5.521200e-03_rb,5.139543e-03_rb/)
9929 absice2(:,3) = (/ &
9930! band 3
9931 1.065397e-01_rb,8.005726e-02_rb,6.546428e-02_rb,5.589131e-02_rb,4.898681e-02_rb, &
9932 4.369932e-02_rb,3.947901e-02_rb,3.600676e-02_rb,3.308299e-02_rb,3.057561e-02_rb, &
9933 2.839325e-02_rb,2.647040e-02_rb,2.475872e-02_rb,2.322164e-02_rb,2.183091e-02_rb, &
9934 2.056430e-02_rb,1.940407e-02_rb,1.833586e-02_rb,1.734787e-02_rb,1.643034e-02_rb, &
9935 1.557512e-02_rb,1.477530e-02_rb,1.402501e-02_rb,1.331924e-02_rb,1.265364e-02_rb, &
9936 1.202445e-02_rb,1.142838e-02_rb,1.086257e-02_rb,1.032445e-02_rb,9.811791e-03_rb, &
9937 9.322587e-03_rb,8.855053e-03_rb,8.407591e-03_rb,7.978763e-03_rb,7.567273e-03_rb, &
9938 7.171949e-03_rb,6.791728e-03_rb,6.425642e-03_rb,6.072809e-03_rb,5.732424e-03_rb, &
9939 5.403748e-03_rb,5.086103e-03_rb,4.778865e-03_rb/)
9940 absice2(:,4) = (/ &
9941! band 4
9942 1.804566e-01_rb,1.168987e-01_rb,8.680442e-02_rb,6.910060e-02_rb,5.738174e-02_rb, &
9943 4.902332e-02_rb,4.274585e-02_rb,3.784923e-02_rb,3.391734e-02_rb,3.068690e-02_rb, &
9944 2.798301e-02_rb,2.568480e-02_rb,2.370600e-02_rb,2.198337e-02_rb,2.046940e-02_rb, &
9945 1.912777e-02_rb,1.793016e-02_rb,1.685420e-02_rb,1.588193e-02_rb,1.499882e-02_rb, &
9946 1.419293e-02_rb,1.345440e-02_rb,1.277496e-02_rb,1.214769e-02_rb,1.156669e-02_rb, &
9947 1.102694e-02_rb,1.052412e-02_rb,1.005451e-02_rb,9.614854e-03_rb,9.202335e-03_rb, &
9948 8.814470e-03_rb,8.449077e-03_rb,8.104223e-03_rb,7.778195e-03_rb,7.469466e-03_rb, &
9949 7.176671e-03_rb,6.898588e-03_rb,6.634117e-03_rb,6.382264e-03_rb,6.142134e-03_rb, &
9950 5.912913e-03_rb,5.693862e-03_rb,5.484308e-03_rb/)
9951 absice2(:,5) = (/ &
9952! band 5
9953 2.131806e-01_rb,1.311372e-01_rb,9.407171e-02_rb,7.299442e-02_rb,5.941273e-02_rb, &
9954 4.994043e-02_rb,4.296242e-02_rb,3.761113e-02_rb,3.337910e-02_rb,2.994978e-02_rb, &
9955 2.711556e-02_rb,2.473461e-02_rb,2.270681e-02_rb,2.095943e-02_rb,1.943839e-02_rb, &

10480 1.50936e-02_rb, 1.48146e-02_rb, 1.45429e-02_rb, 1.42782e-02_rb, 1.40203e-02_rb, &
10481 1.37691e-02_rb, 1.35243e-02_rb, 1.32858e-02_rb, 1.30534e-02_rb, 1.28270e-02_rb, &
10482 1.26062e-02_rb, 1.23909e-02_rb, 1.21810e-02_rb, 1.19763e-02_rb, 1.17766e-02_rb, &
10483 1.15817e-02_rb, 1.13915e-02_rb, 1.12058e-02_rb/)
10484 absliq1(:,15) = (/ &
10485! band 15
10486 5.02079e-03_rb, 2.17615e-02_rb, 2.55449e-02_rb, 2.59484e-02_rb, 2.53650e-02_rb, &
10487 2.45281e-02_rb, 2.36843e-02_rb, 2.29159e-02_rb, 2.22451e-02_rb, 2.16716e-02_rb, &
10488 2.11451e-02_rb, 2.05817e-02_rb, 2.00454e-02_rb, 1.95372e-02_rb, 1.90567e-02_rb, &
10489 1.86028e-02_rb, 1.81742e-02_rb, 1.77693e-02_rb, 1.73866e-02_rb, 1.70244e-02_rb, &
10490 1.66815e-02_rb, 1.63563e-02_rb, 1.60477e-02_rb, 1.57544e-02_rb, 1.54755e-02_rb, &
10491 1.52097e-02_rb, 1.49564e-02_rb, 1.47146e-02_rb, 1.43684e-02_rb, 1.41728e-02_rb, &
10492 1.39762e-02_rb, 1.37797e-02_rb, 1.35838e-02_rb, 1.33891e-02_rb, 1.31961e-02_rb, &
10493 1.30051e-02_rb, 1.28164e-02_rb, 1.26302e-02_rb, 1.24466e-02_rb, 1.22659e-02_rb, &
10494 1.20881e-02_rb, 1.19131e-02_rb, 1.17412e-02_rb, 1.15723e-02_rb, 1.14063e-02_rb, &
10495 1.12434e-02_rb, 1.10834e-02_rb, 1.09264e-02_rb, 1.07722e-02_rb, 1.06210e-02_rb, &
10496 1.04725e-02_rb, 1.03269e-02_rb, 1.01839e-02_rb, 1.00436e-02_rb, 9.90593e-03_rb, &
10497 9.77080e-03_rb, 9.63818e-03_rb, 9.50800e-03_rb/)
10498 absliq1(:,16) = (/ &
10499! band 16
10500 5.64971e-02_rb, 9.04736e-02_rb, 8.11726e-02_rb, 7.05450e-02_rb, 6.20052e-02_rb, &
10501 5.54286e-02_rb, 5.03503e-02_rb, 4.63791e-02_rb, 4.32290e-02_rb, 4.06959e-02_rb, &
10502 3.74690e-02_rb, 3.52964e-02_rb, 3.33799e-02_rb, 3.16774e-02_rb, 3.01550e-02_rb, &
10503 2.87856e-02_rb, 2.75474e-02_rb, 2.64223e-02_rb, 2.53953e-02_rb, 2.44542e-02_rb, &
10504 2.35885e-02_rb, 2.27894e-02_rb, 2.20494e-02_rb, 2.13622e-02_rb, 2.07222e-02_rb, &
10505 2.01246e-02_rb, 1.95654e-02_rb, 1.90408e-02_rb, 1.84398e-02_rb, 1.80021e-02_rb, &
10506 1.75816e-02_rb, 1.71775e-02_rb, 1.67889e-02_rb, 1.64152e-02_rb, 1.60554e-02_rb, &
10507 1.57089e-02_rb, 1.53751e-02_rb, 1.50531e-02_rb, 1.47426e-02_rb, 1.44428e-02_rb, &
10508 1.41532e-02_rb, 1.38734e-02_rb, 1.36028e-02_rb, 1.33410e-02_rb, 1.30875e-02_rb, &
10509 1.28420e-02_rb, 1.26041e-02_rb, 1.23735e-02_rb, 1.21497e-02_rb, 1.19325e-02_rb, &
10510 1.17216e-02_rb, 1.15168e-02_rb, 1.13177e-02_rb, 1.11241e-02_rb, 1.09358e-02_rb, &
10511 1.07525e-02_rb, 1.05741e-02_rb, 1.04003e-02_rb/)
10512
10513 end subroutine lwcldpr
10514
10515 end module rrtmg_lw_init
10516
10517! path: $Source: /cvsroot/NWP/WRFV3/phys/module_ra_rrtmg_lw.F,v $
10518! author: $Author: trn $
10519! revision: $Revision: 1.3 $
10520! created: $Date: 2009/04/16 19:54:22 $
10521!
10522 module rrtmg_lw_rad
10523
10524! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
10525! | |
10526! | Copyright 2002-2008, Atmospheric & Environmental Research, Inc. (AER). |
10527! | This software may be used, copied, or redistributed as long as it is |
10528! | not sold and this copyright notice is reproduced on each copy made. |
10529! | This model is provided as is without any express or implied warranties. |
10530! | (http://www.rtweb.aer.com/) |
10531! | |
10532! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
10533!
10534! ****************************************************************************
10535! * *
10536! * RRTMG_LW *
10537! * *
10538! * *
10539! * *
10540! * a rapid radiative transfer model *
10541! * for the longwave region *
10542! * for application to general circulation models *
10543! * *
10544! * *
10545! * Atmospheric and Environmental Research, Inc. *
10546! * 131 Hartwell Avenue *
10547! * Lexington, MA 02421 *
10548! * *
10549! * *
10550! * Eli J. Mlawer *
10551! * Jennifer S. Delamere *
10552! * Michael J. Iacono *
10553! * Shepard A. Clough *
10554! * *
10555! * *
10556! * *
10557! * *
10558! * *
10559! * *
10560! * email: miacono@aer.com *
10561! * email: emlawer@aer.com *
10562! * email: jdelamer@aer.com *
10563! * *
10564! * The authors wish to acknowledge the contributions of the *
10565! * following people: Steven J. Taubman, Karen Cady-Pereira, *
10566! * Patrick D. Brown, Ronald E. Farren, Luke Chen, Robert Bergstrom. *
10567! * *
10568! ****************************************************************************
10569
10570! -------- Modules --------
10571 use parkind, only : im => kind_im, rb => kind_rb
10572 use rrlw_vsn
10573 use mcica_subcol_gen_lw, only: mcica_subcol_lw
10574 use rrtmg_lw_cldprmc, only: cldprmc
10575! *** Move the required call to rrtmg_lw_ini below and the following
10576! use association to the GCM initialization area ***
10577! use rrtmg_lw_init, only: rrtmg_lw_ini
10578 use rrtmg_lw_rtrnmc, only: rtrnmc
10579 use rrtmg_lw_setcoef, only: setcoef
10580 use rrtmg_lw_taumol, only: taumol
10581
10582 implicit none
10583
10584! public interfaces/functions/subroutines
10585 public :: rrtmg_lw, inatm
10586
10587!------------------------------------------------------------------
10588 contains
10589!------------------------------------------------------------------
10590
10591!------------------------------------------------------------------
10592! Public subroutines
10593!------------------------------------------------------------------
10594
10595 subroutine rrtmg_lw &
10596 (ncol ,nlay ,icld , &
10597 play ,plev ,tlay ,tlev ,tsfc , &
10598 h2ovmr ,o3vmr ,co2vmr ,ch4vmr ,n2ovmr ,o2vmr , &
10599 cfc11vmr,cfc12vmr,cfc22vmr,ccl4vmr ,emis , &
10600 inflglw ,iceflglw,liqflglw,cldfmcl , &
10601 taucmcl ,ciwpmcl ,clwpmcl , cswpmcl ,reicmcl ,relqmcl , resnmcl , &
10602 tauaer , &
10603 uflx ,dflx ,hr ,uflxc ,dflxc, hrc)
10604
10605! -------- Description --------
10606
10607! This program is the driver subroutine for RRTMG_LW, the AER LW radiation
10608! model for application to GCMs, that has been adapted from RRTM_LW for
10609! improved efficiency.
10610!
10611! NOTE: The call to RRTMG_LW_INI should be moved to the GCM initialization
10612! area, since this has to be called only once.
10613!
10614! This routine:
10615! a) calls INATM to read in the atmospheric profile from GCM;
10616! all layering in RRTMG is ordered from surface to toa.
10617! b) calls CLDPRMC to set cloud optical depth for McICA based
10618! on input cloud properties
10619! c) calls SETCOEF to calculate various quantities needed for
10620! the radiative transfer algorithm
10621! d) calls TAUMOL to calculate gaseous optical depths for each
10622! of the 16 spectral bands
10623! e) calls RTRNMC (for both clear and cloudy profiles) to perform the
10624! radiative transfer calculation using McICA, the Monte-Carlo
10625! Independent Column Approximation, to represent sub-grid scale
10626! cloud variability
10627! f) passes the necessary fluxes and cooling rates back to GCM
10628!
10629! Two modes of operation are possible:
10630! The mode is chosen by using either rrtmg_lw.nomcica.f90 (to not use
10631! McICA) or rrtmg_lw.f90 (to use McICA) to interface with a GCM.
10632!
10633! 1) Standard, single forward model calculation (imca = 0)
10634! 2) Monte Carlo Independent Column Approximation (McICA, Pincus et al.,
10635! JC, 2003) method is applied to the forward model calculation (imca = 1)
10636!
10637! This call to RRTMG_LW must be preceeded by a call to the module
10638! mcica_subcol_gen_lw.f90 to run the McICA sub-column cloud generator,
10639! which will provide the cloud physical or cloud optical properties
10640! on the RRTMG quadrature point (ngpt) dimension.
10641! Two random number generators are available for use when imca = 1.
10642! This is chosen by setting flag irnd on input to mcica_subcol_gen_lw.
10643! 1) KISSVEC (irnd = 0)
10644! 2) Mersenne-Twister (irnd = 1)
10645!
10646! Two methods of cloud property input are possible:
10647! Cloud properties can be input in one of two ways (controlled by input
10648! flags inflglw, iceflglw, and liqflglw; see text file rrtmg_lw_instructions
10649! and subroutine rrtmg_lw_cldprop.f90 for further details):
10650!
10651! 1) Input cloud fraction and cloud optical depth directly (inflglw = 0)
10652! 2) Input cloud fraction and cloud physical properties (inflglw = 1 or 2);
10653! cloud optical properties are calculated by cldprop or cldprmc based
10654! on input settings of iceflglw and liqflglw. Ice particle size provided
10655! must be appropriately defined for the ice parameterization selected.
10656!
10657! One method of aerosol property input is possible:
10658! Aerosol properties can be input in only one way (controlled by input
10659! flag iaer; see text file rrtmg_lw_instructions for further details):
10660!
10661! 1) Input aerosol optical depth directly by layer and spectral band (iaer=10);
10662! band average optical depth at the mid-point of each spectral band.
10663! RRTMG_LW currently treats only aerosol absorption;
10664! scattering capability is not presently available.
10665!
10666!
10667! ------- Modifications -------
10668!
10669! This version of RRTMG_LW has been modified from RRTM_LW to use a reduced
10670! set of g-points for application to GCMs.
10671!
10672!-- Original version (derived from RRTM_LW), reduction of g-points, other
10673! revisions for use with GCMs.
10674! 1999: M. J. Iacono, AER, Inc.
10675!-- Adapted for use with NCAR/CAM.
10676! May 2004: M. J. Iacono, AER, Inc.
10677!-- Revised to add McICA capability.
10678! Nov 2005: M. J. Iacono, AER, Inc.
10679!-- Conversion to F90 formatting for consistency with rrtmg_sw.
10680! Feb 2007: M. J. Iacono, AER, Inc.
10681!-- Modifications to formatting to use assumed-shape arrays.
10682! Aug 2007: M. J. Iacono, AER, Inc.
10683!-- Modified to add longwave aerosol absorption.
10684! Apr 2008: M. J. Iacono, AER, Inc.
10685
10686! --------- Modules ----------
10687
10688 use parrrtm, only : nbndlw, ngptlw, maxxsec, mxmol
10689 use rrlw_con, only: fluxfac, heatfac, oneminus, pi
10690 use rrlw_wvn, only: ng, ngb, nspa, nspb, wavenum1, wavenum2, delwave
10691
10692! ------- Declarations -------
10693
10694! ----- Input -----
10695 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: ncol ! Number of horizontal columns
10696 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: nlay ! Number of model layers
10697 integer(kind=im), intent(inout) :: icld ! Cloud overlap method
10698 ! 0: Clear only
10699 ! 1: Random
10700 ! 2: Maximum/random
10701 ! 3: Maximum
10702 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: play(:,:) ! Layer pressures (hPa, mb)
10703 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10704 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: plev(:,:) ! Interface pressures (hPa, mb)
10705 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay+1)
10706 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tlay(:,:) ! Layer temperatures (K)
10707 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10708 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tlev(:,:) ! Interface temperatures (K)
10709 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay+1)
10710 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tsfc(:) ! Surface temperature (K)
10711 ! Dimensions: (ncol)
10712 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: h2ovmr(:,:) ! H2O volume mixing ratio
10713 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10714 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: o3vmr(:,:) ! O3 volume mixing ratio
10715 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10716 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: co2vmr(:,:) ! CO2 volume mixing ratio
10717 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10718 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: ch4vmr(:,:) ! Methane volume mixing ratio
10719 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10720 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: n2ovmr(:,:) ! Nitrous oxide volume mixing ratio
10721 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10722 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: o2vmr(:,:) ! Oxygen volume mixing ratio
10723 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10724 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cfc11vmr(:,:) ! CFC11 volume mixing ratio
10725 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10726 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cfc12vmr(:,:) ! CFC12 volume mixing ratio
10727 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10728 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cfc22vmr(:,:) ! CFC22 volume mixing ratio
10729 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10730 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: ccl4vmr(:,:) ! CCL4 volume mixing ratio
10731 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10732 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: emis(:,:) ! Surface emissivity
10733 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nbndlw)
10734
10735 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: inflglw ! Flag for cloud optical properties
10736 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: iceflglw ! Flag for ice particle specification
10737 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: liqflglw ! Flag for liquid droplet specification
10738
10739 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cldfmcl(:,:,:) ! Cloud fraction
10740 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
10741 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: ciwpmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud ice water path (g/m2)
10742 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
10743 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: clwpmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud liquid water path (g/m2)
10744 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
10745 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cswpmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud snow water path (g/m2)
10746 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
10747 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: reicmcl(:,:) ! Cloud ice particle effective size (microns)
10748 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10749 ! specific definition of reicmcl depends on setting of iceflglw:
10750 ! iceflglw = 0: ice effective radius, r_ec, (Ebert and Curry, 1992),
10751 ! r_ec must be >= 10.0 microns
10752 ! iceflglw = 1: ice effective radius, r_ec, (Ebert and Curry, 1992),
10753 ! r_ec range is limited to 13.0 to 130.0 microns
10754 ! iceflglw = 2: ice effective radius, r_k, (Key, Streamer Ref. Manual, 1996)
10755 ! r_k range is limited to 5.0 to 131.0 microns
10756 ! iceflglw = 3: generalized effective size, dge, (Fu, 1996),
10757 ! dge range is limited to 5.0 to 140.0 microns
10758 ! [dge = 1.0315 * r_ec]
10759 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: relqmcl(:,:) ! Cloud water drop effective radius (microns)
10760 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10761 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: resnmcl(:,:) ! Snow effective radius (microns)
10762 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10763 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: taucmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud optical depth
10764 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
10765! real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: ssacmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud single scattering albedo
10766 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
10767 ! for future expansion
10768 ! lw scattering not yet available
10769! real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: asmcmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud asymmetry parameter
10770 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
10771 ! for future expansion
10772 ! lw scattering not yet available
10773 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tauaer(:,:,:) ! aerosol optical depth
10774 ! at mid-point of LW spectral bands
10775 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay,nbndlw)
10776! real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: ssaaer(:,:,:) ! aerosol single scattering albedo
10777 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay,nbndlw)
10778 ! for future expansion
10779 ! (lw aerosols/scattering not yet available)
10780! real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: asmaer(:,:,:) ! aerosol asymmetry parameter
10781 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay,nbndlw)
10782 ! for future expansion
10783 ! (lw aerosols/scattering not yet available)
10784
10785! ----- Output -----
10786
10787 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: uflx(:,:) ! Total sky longwave upward flux (W/m2)
10788 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay+1)
10789 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: dflx(:,:) ! Total sky longwave downward flux (W/m2)
10790 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay+1)
10791 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: hr(:,:) ! Total sky longwave radiative heating rate (K/d)
10792 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10793 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: uflxc(:,:) ! Clear sky longwave upward flux (W/m2)
10794 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay+1)
10795 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: dflxc(:,:) ! Clear sky longwave downward flux (W/m2)
10796 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay+1)
10797 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: hrc(:,:) ! Clear sky longwave radiative heating rate (K/d)
10798 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
10799
10800! ----- Local -----
10801
10802! Control
10803 integer(kind=im) :: nlayers ! total number of layers
10804 integer(kind=im) :: istart ! beginning band of calculation
10805 integer(kind=im) :: iend ! ending band of calculation
10806 integer(kind=im) :: iout ! output option flag (inactive)
10807 integer(kind=im) :: iaer ! aerosol option flag
10808 integer(kind=im) :: iplon ! column loop index
10809 integer(kind=im) :: imca ! flag for mcica [0=off, 1=on]
10810 integer(kind=im) :: ims ! value for changing mcica permute seed
10811 integer(kind=im) :: k ! layer loop index
10812 integer(kind=im) :: ig ! g-point loop index
10813
10814! Atmosphere
10815 real(kind=rb) :: pavel(nlay+1) ! layer pressures (mb)
10816 real(kind=rb) :: tavel(nlay+1) ! layer temperatures (K)
10817 real(kind=rb) :: pz(0:nlay+1) ! level (interface) pressures (hPa, mb)
10818 real(kind=rb) :: tz(0:nlay+1) ! level (interface) temperatures (K)
10819 real(kind=rb) :: tbound ! surface temperature (K)
10820 real(kind=rb) :: coldry(nlay+1) ! dry air column density (mol/cm2)
10821 real(kind=rb) :: wbrodl(nlay+1) ! broadening gas column density (mol/cm2)
10822 real(kind=rb) :: wkl(mxmol,nlay+1) ! molecular amounts (mol/cm-2)
10823 real(kind=rb) :: wx(maxxsec,nlay+1) ! cross-section amounts (mol/cm-2)
10824 real(kind=rb) :: pwvcm ! precipitable water vapor (cm)
10825 real(kind=rb) :: semiss(nbndlw) ! lw surface emissivity
10826 real(kind=rb) :: fracs(nlay+1,ngptlw) !
10827 real(kind=rb) :: taug(nlay+1,ngptlw) ! gaseous optical depths
10828 real(kind=rb) :: taut(nlay+1,ngptlw) ! gaseous + aerosol optical depths
10829
10830 real(kind=rb) :: taua(nlay+1,nbndlw) ! aerosol optical depth
10831! real(kind=rb) :: ssaa(nlay+1,nbndlw) ! aerosol single scattering albedo
10832 ! for future expansion
10833 ! (lw aerosols/scattering not yet available)
10834! real(kind=rb) :: asma(nlay+1,nbndlw) ! aerosol asymmetry parameter
10835 ! for future expansion
10836 ! (lw aerosols/scattering not yet available)
10837
10838! Atmosphere - setcoef
10839 integer(kind=im) :: laytrop ! tropopause layer index
10840 integer(kind=im) :: jp(nlay+1) ! lookup table index
10841 integer(kind=im) :: jt(nlay+1) ! lookup table index
10842 integer(kind=im) :: jt1(nlay+1) ! lookup table index
10843 real(kind=rb) :: planklay(nlay+1,nbndlw)!
10844 real(kind=rb) :: planklev(0:nlay+1,nbndlw)!
10845 real(kind=rb) :: plankbnd(nbndlw) !
10846
10847 real(kind=rb) :: colh2o(nlay+1) ! column amount (h2o)
10848 real(kind=rb) :: colco2(nlay+1) ! column amount (co2)
10849 real(kind=rb) :: colo3(nlay+1) ! column amount (o3)
10850 real(kind=rb) :: coln2o(nlay+1) ! column amount (n2o)
10851 real(kind=rb) :: colco(nlay+1) ! column amount (co)
10852 real(kind=rb) :: colch4(nlay+1) ! column amount (ch4)
10853 real(kind=rb) :: colo2(nlay+1) ! column amount (o2)
10854 real(kind=rb) :: colbrd(nlay+1) ! column amount (broadening gases)
10855
10856 integer(kind=im) :: indself(nlay+1)
10857 integer(kind=im) :: indfor(nlay+1)
10858 real(kind=rb) :: selffac(nlay+1)
10859 real(kind=rb) :: selffrac(nlay+1)
10860 real(kind=rb) :: forfac(nlay+1)
10861 real(kind=rb) :: forfrac(nlay+1)
10862
10863 integer(kind=im) :: indminor(nlay+1)
10864 real(kind=rb) :: minorfrac(nlay+1)
10865 real(kind=rb) :: scaleminor(nlay+1)
10866 real(kind=rb) :: scaleminorn2(nlay+1)
10867
10868 real(kind=rb) :: & !
10869 fac00(nlay+1), fac01(nlay+1), &
10870 fac10(nlay+1), fac11(nlay+1)
10871 real(kind=rb) :: & !
10872 rat_h2oco2(nlay+1),rat_h2oco2_1(nlay+1), &
10873 rat_h2oo3(nlay+1),rat_h2oo3_1(nlay+1), &
10874 rat_h2on2o(nlay+1),rat_h2on2o_1(nlay+1), &
10875 rat_h2och4(nlay+1),rat_h2och4_1(nlay+1), &
10876 rat_n2oco2(nlay+1),rat_n2oco2_1(nlay+1), &
10877 rat_o3co2(nlay+1),rat_o3co2_1(nlay+1)
10878
10879! Atmosphere/clouds - cldprop
10880 integer(kind=im) :: ncbands ! number of cloud spectral bands
10881 integer(kind=im) :: inflag ! flag for cloud property method
10882 integer(kind=im) :: iceflag ! flag for ice cloud properties
10883 integer(kind=im) :: liqflag ! flag for liquid cloud properties
10884
10885! Atmosphere/clouds - cldprmc [mcica]
10886 real(kind=rb) :: cldfmc(ngptlw,nlay+1) ! cloud fraction [mcica]
10887 real(kind=rb) :: ciwpmc(ngptlw,nlay+1) ! in-cloud ice water path [mcica]
10888 real(kind=rb) :: clwpmc(ngptlw,nlay+1) ! in-cloud liquid water path [mcica]
10889 real(kind=rb) :: cswpmc(ngptlw,nlay+1) ! in-cloud snow path [mcica]
10890 real(kind=rb) :: relqmc(nlay+1) ! liquid particle effective radius (microns)
10891 real(kind=rb) :: reicmc(nlay+1) ! ice particle effective size (microns)
10892 real(kind=rb) :: resnmc(nlay+1) ! snow particle effective size (microns)
10893 real(kind=rb) :: taucmc(ngptlw,nlay+1) ! in-cloud optical depth [mcica]
10894! real(kind=rb) :: ssacmc(ngptlw,nlay+1) ! in-cloud single scattering albedo [mcica]
10895 ! for future expansion
10896 ! (lw scattering not yet available)
10897! real(kind=rb) :: asmcmc(ngptlw,nlay+1) ! in-cloud asymmetry parameter [mcica]
10898 ! for future expansion
10899 ! (lw scattering not yet available)
10900
10901! Output
10902 real(kind=rb) :: totuflux(0:nlay+1) ! upward longwave flux (w/m2)
10903 real(kind=rb) :: totdflux(0:nlay+1) ! downward longwave flux (w/m2)
10904 real(kind=rb) :: fnet(0:nlay+1) ! net longwave flux (w/m2)
10905 real(kind=rb) :: htr(0:nlay+1) ! longwave heating rate (k/day)
10906 real(kind=rb) :: totuclfl(0:nlay+1) ! clear sky upward longwave flux (w/m2)
10907 real(kind=rb) :: totdclfl(0:nlay+1) ! clear sky downward longwave flux (w/m2)
10908 real(kind=rb) :: fnetc(0:nlay+1) ! clear sky net longwave flux (w/m2)
10909 real(kind=rb) :: htrc(0:nlay+1) ! clear sky longwave heating rate (k/day)
10910
10911!
10912! Initializations
10913
10914!jm not thread safe oneminus = 1._rb - 1.e-6_rb
10915!jm not thread safe pi = 2._rb * asin(1._rb)
10916!jm not thread safe fluxfac = pi * 2.e4_rb ! orig: fluxfac = pi * 2.d4
10917 istart = 1
10918 iend = 16
10919 iout = 0
10920 ims = 1
10921
10922! Set imca to select calculation type:
10923! imca = 0, use standard forward model calculation
10924! imca = 1, use McICA for Monte Carlo treatment of sub-grid cloud variability
10925
10926! *** This version uses McICA (imca = 1) ***
10927
10928! Set icld to select of clear or cloud calculation and cloud overlap method
10929! icld = 0, clear only
10930! icld = 1, with clouds using random cloud overlap
10931! icld = 2, with clouds using maximum/random cloud overlap
10932! icld = 3, with clouds using maximum cloud overlap (McICA only)
10933 if (icld.lt.0.or.icld.gt.3) icld = 2
10934
10935! Set iaer to select aerosol option
10936! iaer = 0, no aerosols
10937! icld = 10, input total aerosol optical depth (tauaer) directly
10938 iaer = 10
10939
10940! Call model and data initialization, compute lookup tables, perform
10941! reduction of g-points from 256 to 140 for input absorption coefficient
10942! data and other arrays.
10943!
10944! In a GCM this call should be placed in the model initialization
10945! area, since this has to be called only once.
10946! call rrtmg_lw_ini(cpdair)
10947
10948! This is the main longitude/column loop within RRTMG.
10949 do iplon = 1, ncol
10950
10951! Prepare atmospheric profile from GCM for use in RRTMG, and define
10952! other input parameters.
10953
10954 call inatm (iplon, nlay, icld, iaer, &
10955 play, plev, tlay, tlev, tsfc, h2ovmr, &
10956 o3vmr, co2vmr, ch4vmr, n2ovmr, o2vmr, cfc11vmr, cfc12vmr, &
10957 cfc22vmr, ccl4vmr, emis, inflglw, iceflglw, liqflglw, &
10958 cldfmcl, taucmcl, ciwpmcl, clwpmcl, cswpmcl, reicmcl, relqmcl, resnmcl, tauaer, &
10959 nlayers, pavel, pz, tavel, tz, tbound, semiss, coldry, &
10960 wkl, wbrodl, wx, pwvcm, inflag, iceflag, liqflag, &
10961 cldfmc, taucmc, ciwpmc, clwpmc, cswpmc, reicmc, relqmc, resnmc, taua)
10962
10963! For cloudy atmosphere, use cldprop to set cloud optical properties based on
10964! input cloud physical properties. Select method based on choices described
10965! in cldprop. Cloud fraction, water path, liquid droplet and ice particle
10966! effective radius must be passed into cldprop. Cloud fraction and cloud
10967! optical depth are transferred to rrtmg_lw arrays in cldprop.
10968
10969 call cldprmc(nlayers, inflag, iceflag, liqflag, cldfmc, ciwpmc, &
10970 clwpmc, cswpmc, reicmc, relqmc, resnmc, ncbands, taucmc)
10971
10972! Calculate information needed by the radiative transfer routine
10973! that is specific to this atmosphere, especially some of the
10974! coefficients and indices needed to compute the optical depths
10975! by interpolating data from stored reference atmospheres.
10976
10977 call setcoef(nlayers, istart, pavel, tavel, tz, tbound, semiss, &
10978 coldry, wkl, wbrodl, &
10979 laytrop, jp, jt, jt1, planklay, planklev, plankbnd, &
10980 colh2o, colco2, colo3, coln2o, colco, colch4, colo2, &
10981 colbrd, fac00, fac01, fac10, fac11, &
10982 rat_h2oco2, rat_h2oco2_1, rat_h2oo3, rat_h2oo3_1, &
10983 rat_h2on2o, rat_h2on2o_1, rat_h2och4, rat_h2och4_1, &
10984 rat_n2oco2, rat_n2oco2_1, rat_o3co2, rat_o3co2_1, &
10985 selffac, selffrac, indself, forfac, forfrac, indfor, &
10986 minorfrac, scaleminor, scaleminorn2, indminor)
10987
10988! Calculate the gaseous optical depths and Planck fractions for
10989! each longwave spectral band.
10990
10991 call taumol(nlayers, pavel, wx, coldry, &
10992 laytrop, jp, jt, jt1, planklay, planklev, plankbnd, &
10993 colh2o, colco2, colo3, coln2o, colco, colch4, colo2, &
10994 colbrd, fac00, fac01, fac10, fac11, &
10995 rat_h2oco2, rat_h2oco2_1, rat_h2oo3, rat_h2oo3_1, &
10996 rat_h2on2o, rat_h2on2o_1, rat_h2och4, rat_h2och4_1, &
10997 rat_n2oco2, rat_n2oco2_1, rat_o3co2, rat_o3co2_1, &
10998 selffac, selffrac, indself, forfac, forfrac, indfor, &
10999 minorfrac, scaleminor, scaleminorn2, indminor, &
11000 fracs, taug)
11001
11002
11003! Combine gaseous and aerosol optical depths, if aerosol active
11004 if (iaer .eq. 0) then
11005 do k = 1, nlayers
11006 do ig = 1, ngptlw
11007 taut(k,ig) = taug(k,ig)
11008 enddo
11009 enddo
11010 elseif (iaer .eq. 10) then
11011 do k = 1, nlayers
11012 do ig = 1, ngptlw
11013 taut(k,ig) = taug(k,ig) + taua(k,ngb(ig))
11014 enddo
11015 enddo
11016 endif
11017
11018! Call the radiative transfer routine.
11019! Either routine can be called to do clear sky calculation. If clouds
11020! are present, then select routine based on cloud overlap assumption
11021! to be used. Clear sky calculation is done simultaneously.
11022! For McICA, RTRNMC is called for clear and cloudy calculations.
11023
11024 call rtrnmc(nlayers, istart, iend, iout, pz, semiss, ncbands, &
11025 cldfmc, taucmc, planklay, planklev, plankbnd, &
11026 pwvcm, fracs, taut, &
11027 totuflux, totdflux, fnet, htr, &
11028 totuclfl, totdclfl, fnetc, htrc )
11029
11030! Transfer up and down fluxes and heating rate to output arrays.
11031! Vertical indexing goes from bottom to top; reverse here for GCM if necessary.
11032
11033 do k = 0, nlayers
11034 uflx(iplon,k+1) = totuflux(k)
11035 dflx(iplon,k+1) = totdflux(k)
11036 uflxc(iplon,k+1) = totuclfl(k)
11037 dflxc(iplon,k+1) = totdclfl(k)
11038 enddo
11039 do k = 0, nlayers-1
11040 hr(iplon,k+1) = htr(k)
11041 hrc(iplon,k+1) = htrc(k)
11042 enddo
11043
11044 enddo
11045
11046 end subroutine rrtmg_lw
11047
11048!***************************************************************************
11049 subroutine inatm (iplon, nlay, icld, iaer, &
11050 play, plev, tlay, tlev, tsfc, h2ovmr, &
11051 o3vmr, co2vmr, ch4vmr, n2ovmr, o2vmr, cfc11vmr, cfc12vmr, &
11052 cfc22vmr, ccl4vmr, emis, inflglw, iceflglw, liqflglw, &
11053 cldfmcl, taucmcl, ciwpmcl, clwpmcl, cswpmcl, reicmcl, relqmcl, resnmcl, tauaer, &
11054 nlayers, pavel, pz, tavel, tz, tbound, semiss, coldry, &
11055 wkl, wbrodl, wx, pwvcm, inflag, iceflag, liqflag, &
11056 cldfmc, taucmc, ciwpmc, clwpmc, cswpmc, reicmc, relqmc, resnmc, taua)
11057!***************************************************************************
11058!
11059! Input atmospheric profile from GCM, and prepare it for use in RRTMG_LW.
11060! Set other RRTMG_LW input parameters.
11061!
11062!***************************************************************************
11063
11064! --------- Modules ----------
11065
11066 use parrrtm, only : nbndlw, ngptlw, nmol, maxxsec, mxmol
11067 use rrlw_con, only: fluxfac, heatfac, oneminus, pi, grav, avogad
11068 use rrlw_wvn, only: ng, nspa, nspb, wavenum1, wavenum2, delwave, ixindx
11069
11070! ------- Declarations -------
11071
11072! ----- Input -----
11073 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: iplon ! column loop index
11074 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: nlay ! Number of model layers
11075 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: icld ! clear/cloud and cloud overlap flag
11076 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: iaer ! aerosol option flag
11077
11078 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: play(:,:) ! Layer pressures (hPa, mb)
11079 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11080 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: plev(:,:) ! Interface pressures (hPa, mb)
11081 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay+1)
11082 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tlay(:,:) ! Layer temperatures (K)
11083 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11084 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tlev(:,:) ! Interface temperatures (K)
11085 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay+1)
11086 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tsfc(:) ! Surface temperature (K)
11087 ! Dimensions: (ncol)
11088 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: h2ovmr(:,:) ! H2O volume mixing ratio
11089 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11090 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: o3vmr(:,:) ! O3 volume mixing ratio
11091 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11092 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: co2vmr(:,:) ! CO2 volume mixing ratio
11093 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11094 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: ch4vmr(:,:) ! Methane volume mixing ratio
11095 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11096 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: n2ovmr(:,:) ! Nitrous oxide volume mixing ratio
11097 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11098 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: o2vmr(:,:) ! Oxygen volume mixing ratio
11099 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11100 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cfc11vmr(:,:) ! CFC11 volume mixing ratio
11101 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11102 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cfc12vmr(:,:) ! CFC12 volume mixing ratio
11103 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11104 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cfc22vmr(:,:) ! CFC22 volume mixing ratio
11105 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11106 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: ccl4vmr(:,:) ! CCL4 volume mixing ratio
11107 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11108 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: emis(:,:) ! Surface emissivity
11109 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nbndlw)
11110
11111 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: inflglw ! Flag for cloud optical properties
11112 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: iceflglw ! Flag for ice particle specification
11113 integer(kind=im), intent(in) :: liqflglw ! Flag for liquid droplet specification
11114
11115 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cldfmcl(:,:,:) ! Cloud fraction
11116 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
11117 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: ciwpmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud ice water path (g/m2)
11118 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
11119 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: clwpmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud liquid water path (g/m2)
11120 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
11121 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: cswpmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud snow water path (g/m2)
11122 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
11123 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: relqmcl(:,:) ! Cloud water drop effective radius (microns)
11124 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11125 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: reicmcl(:,:) ! Cloud ice effective size (microns)
11126 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11127 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: resnmcl(:,:) ! Snow effective size (microns)
11128 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay)
11129 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: taucmcl(:,:,:) ! In-cloud optical depth
11130 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,ncol,nlay)
11131 real(kind=rb), intent(in) :: tauaer(:,:,:) ! Aerosol optical depth
11132 ! Dimensions: (ncol,nlay,nbndlw)
11133
11134! ----- Output -----
11135! Atmosphere
11136 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: nlayers ! number of layers
11137
11138 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: pavel(:) ! layer pressures (mb)
11139 ! Dimensions: (nlay)
11140 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: tavel(:) ! layer temperatures (K)
11141 ! Dimensions: (nlay)
11142 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: pz(0:) ! level (interface) pressures (hPa, mb)
11143 ! Dimensions: (0:nlay)
11144 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: tz(0:) ! level (interface) temperatures (K)
11145 ! Dimensions: (0:nlay)
11146 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: tbound ! surface temperature (K)
11147 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: coldry(:) ! dry air column density (mol/cm2)
11148 ! Dimensions: (nlay)
11149 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: wbrodl(:) ! broadening gas column density (mol/cm2)
11150 ! Dimensions: (nlay)
11151 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: wkl(:,:) ! molecular amounts (mol/cm-2)
11152 ! Dimensions: (mxmol,nlay)
11153 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: wx(:,:) ! cross-section amounts (mol/cm-2)
11154 ! Dimensions: (maxxsec,nlay)
11155 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: pwvcm ! precipitable water vapor (cm)
11156 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: semiss(:) ! lw surface emissivity
11157 ! Dimensions: (nbndlw)
11158
11159! Atmosphere/clouds - cldprop
11160 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: inflag ! flag for cloud property method
11161 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: iceflag ! flag for ice cloud properties
11162 integer(kind=im), intent(out) :: liqflag ! flag for liquid cloud properties
11163
11164 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: cldfmc(:,:) ! cloud fraction [mcica]
11165 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,nlay)
11166 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: ciwpmc(:,:) ! in-cloud ice water path [mcica]
11167 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,nlay)
11168 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: clwpmc(:,:) ! in-cloud liquid water path [mcica]
11169 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,nlay)
11170 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: cswpmc(:,:) ! in-cloud snow path [mcica]
11171 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,nlay)
11172 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: relqmc(:) ! liquid particle effective radius (microns)
11173 ! Dimensions: (nlay)
11174 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: reicmc(:) ! ice particle effective size (microns)
11175 ! Dimensions: (nlay)
11176 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: resnmc(:) ! snow effective size (microns)
11177 ! Dimensions: (nlay)
11178 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: taucmc(:,:) ! in-cloud optical depth [mcica]
11179 ! Dimensions: (ngptlw,nlay)
11180 real(kind=rb), intent(out) :: taua(:,:) ! aerosol optical depth
11181 ! Dimensions: (nlay,nbndlw)
11182
11183
11184! ----- Local -----
11185 real(kind=rb), parameter :: amd = 28.9660_rb ! Effective molecular weight of dry air (g/mol)
11186 real(kind=rb), parameter :: amw = 18.0160_rb ! Molecular weight of water vapor (g/mol)
11187! real(kind=rb), parameter :: amc = 44.0098_rb ! Molecular weight of carbon dioxide (g/mol)
11188! real(kind=rb), parameter :: amo = 47.9998_rb ! Molecular weight of ozone (g/mol)
11189! real(kind=rb), parameter :: amo2 = 31.9999_rb ! Molecular weight of oxygen (g/mol)
11190! real(kind=rb), parameter :: amch4 = 16.0430_rb ! Molecular weight of methane (g/mol)
11191! real(kind=rb), parameter :: amn2o = 44.0128_rb ! Molecular weight of nitrous oxide (g/mol)
11192! real(kind=rb), parameter :: amc11 = 137.3684_rb ! Molecular weight of CFC11 (g/mol) - CCL3F
11193! real(kind=rb), parameter :: amc12 = 120.9138_rb ! Molecular weight of CFC12 (g/mol) - CCL2F2
